great budget hotel . the bed , room , and all of part is great , valuable for price . but the loction is a little bit far from the beach . the breakfast is not bad , but maybe the menu can improve . good job .

The hotel was spacious , clean and had some great views from the hotel roof pool . However it definitely needed basic hotel amenities like a pool bar and a gym . The hotel is quite far away from bars and restaurants ( 20 min cab ) so do not stay here if you want to be able to walk anywhere . The staff were very friendly and helpful .

Nice and small hotel with great location in the heart of Kuta . The breakfast included is really nice you can choose från several alternatives . On the downside the pool area is in the shade all day . The rooms are comfortable and silent but not super clean . We didn ' t get new towels twice but as soon as we mentioned it we got them .

Still have a good experience in solaris in my second stay . All rooms are non smoking rooms . The shower and hot water is the best . Rooms need bit more attention in cleanliness but overal is still good . The beach is just few steps from this hotel .

the hotel is modern , the room is ok . but please note the bathroom cannot be locked . a 10 - 15min walk you can come to a convenient store . however during our stay , the hotel experience black out twice , and no announcement nor apologize the next day .

Budgeted Hotel , Good Food , Decent Staff , Very Co - Operative Management , Roof Top Swimming Pool is Very Nice . This hotel is not far away from beautiful beaches of Bali , Rooms are neat & clean every time .
Nice place , quiet but in central kuta , 10 min from beach . Good but simple breakfast . AC was defect but got fixed same day .

I stayed here on 29th September just for few hours in the morning to catch my flight back to Mumbai , India . It is very near to Airport . Also , the location is perfect for beach as well as shopping . . . I would definitely stay here next time I visit Bali . .

We booked through agoda . Great price and the hotel attendants offered great service and were all smiles . The room was as expected , the bathroom gave off a little odor though but closing the door fixed that . Beer opener is next to the toilet ? Anyway , we had a nice night here !

I definitely will choose this hotel again . It ' s small yet has great location and not sto expensive . The room is nice , just the door is kinds broken . Yet it still can lock . Overall I am really happy with my stay here .

The breakfast is not good and don ' t have any variance food , and the signal is very bad in LG floor i should going to GF to have signal selular however over all the hotel is comfy to stay and sleep . . . .

Everything ( Service , staff behavior , room etc . ) was good for given price . I found difficulty in breakfast as i am vegetarian . They didn ' t had much options in veg menu and whatever they had , taste was not good .

The hotel is good , except the room in ground floor , because too many mosquitos there . The staf is friendly and nice . The location is good , since iy is only 15 minutes walk from Ngurah Rai Aitport . The breakfast so - so .

Staff never failed to meet our individual needs with a friendly smile and specific attention to details that met our situation . We felt as if we were in a very luxurious atmosphere at a reasonable rate . Staff was especially caring and attentive .

Location near beach , shopping malls , restaurants , kuta art market . Can walkable to anywhere . Lippo mall & discovery mall is nearer . Hotel rooftop can see sunset . Should be back again to stay here for next trip .

Stayed here to be close to the airport on the last leg of our trip . The hotel is so so . In terms of cleanliness it would be 2 stars . Location would be 3 stars . Customer service 4 stars . Breakfast 2 stars . Prices starts at around $ 50 for a standard double room . I think there are better options around if you would want to spend a little more .

We love staying here which is new and across the road is the beach already with shopping street and good restaurant nearby . Staffs are friendly and helpful , they help us call a cab back to airport and cab arrive in 2 min ! And the checking out of the hotel only take 5 min ! Keep it up ! ! !

This hotel is located 3min walk from the beautiful Kuta beach . Rooms are simple but clean . Bathroom with walkinn shower . Room 318 is quiet . Swimmingpool ok . Nebula testaurant in the hotel is serving nice food , Stafff friendly .

Its location quite close with kuta beach ( about 10min by foot ) . They have good price too . Breakfast are okay and taste good . However , the bed , blanket , towel are not clean . There are some stain left on it .

Hotel staff was very kind , helpful . Food was ok . Spot was very good because just across kuta beach and plenty of food and store near hotel . Recomended . A little too bad some facilities need repairment , overall it was a nice hotel , beautiful scene and good spot .

Staff were all friendly . The room was small and had cockroach in our room . The pool was nice and I think it is the highlight of the hotel . The food is ok . We had massage and it was not too bad . Overall it is an average 3 star hotel considering the price we paid .

I experineced the Fame with the Hollywood style rooms and entire Hotel based on Hollywood theme . Awesome hospitality with sereness and peaceful rooms . Very Friendly staff to guide the tourist . Another plus point located in south Bali near to exotic beaches and Airport and ample of Shopping avenues present nearby .

Have stayed at this hotel many times . Now that all the removations have finished the rooms are the same but the bathrooms are so much better . Staff are excelent as always . Breakfast is always good and the staff will do anything to make your stay a pleasant stay .

category.text: Stayed in Alea hotel twice , Like it so much specially reception staff are very helpful , friendly The hotel for the price I got deserved more . just need some small , tiny renovation But still if I compare it with other hotels stayed is the best one in this category .

Nice hotel , friendly and helpful staff Breakfast and dinner was great Spending the day at pool was great with warm and genuine service from Dewi . Overalls nice experience to stay . Recommended to stay in Bali .

The hotel is conveniently located in the center of Kuta with easy access to all the shopping malls , supermarkets etc . We spent 3 nights here on a bed and breakfast basis . The breakfast buffet had a vast variety of food and even a special corner for vegetarians and action stations . Rooms were well maintained , sufficiently spacious and equally comfortable . I would totally recommend this to another .

We had an excellent stay for one week . Staff is very welcoming , the room was clean , well kept , and quiet . Located a 3 minute walk from the main road with plenty of services and restaurants , but also a short ( approx . 5 minute ) walk from a very nice and clean beach .

Very well recommended hotel . My family and I had several times stay here . The hotel location is closed to the airport and public transport , the room is clean , the staff are friendly , and the swimming pool is nice . We will stay again in this hotel next time we visit Bali .

Good hotel in balance Price / Quality . Clean , good service and friendly , also modern . Nice pool at top riff and close to main street , mall and airport . Quiet hotel inside , good insonorization , friendly workers .

We have stayed here many times and have always found this place to be very hospitable . Nice staff and good sized rooms . Decor is Dated but is not a problem . It is nice to be in s traditional hotel in a great location rather not than one of the modern monstrosities .

Customer service is the worse ever in Bali , so many mosquito , air con leak everywhere , when we book they said we get free Internet but we have to buy drink to get the password , breakfast suck , we ask for queen bed but they put two single bed together . This hotel only good for backpackers , we ended up checking out 3 days earlier and move hotel .

It was my second time stayed at this hotel . During my business trip a week ago I found all services are still same . Room , food , staff are very good and make me feel so comfortable . Compare with another budget hotels , this hotel gives more than I expected .

Had to call waiter over for a drink after 30 minutes . Ordered two pizzas , chips and garlic bread between us . Each dish was brought out separately with 25 minutes in between them . Garlic bread was just a lot of cloves on warm bread and the pizza was a frozen base . Did not get offered a second drink . Staff sat around on phones . Disappointing as the views are beautiful .

I think I can say it ' s the worst hotel I been to in all my trip to Bali ! The staff is unfriendly and give really bad service . . . No towel , no sheet . . We have book for 3 days but we only stay one night ! For the same price or little bit more you can have way better !

Lovely location . . ! ! ! This hotel is surrounded by nice restaurants and bar . . . They also have good restaurant on the rooftop to have some drink and enjoy the sunset . . But the swimming pool is too small for adult . .

Always have the best time at Lakeview , all of their rooms have a balcony to enjoy the magical sunrise of Kintamani . Room are very clean , good effort to reduce plastic use since I notice that they use glass bottles in room and have a refill station in the lobby and restaurant , well done Lakeview !

Stayed for a couple of nights , very clean room and bed linen . Water provided each day and mosquito coil provided each night , an excellent idea which we wish others would do ! Pool is small but clean . Decent choices at breakfast but no fruit or juice . Restaurant in the evening a little disappointing and expensive . Staff very friendly and welcoming .

This hotel is a good deal because it comes with only basic amenities . Things are simple and sometimes rough around edges , but its best feature is that it ' s a budget hotel relatively far away from the noise and annoying touts filling the rest of Kuta .

Visited with friends for a meal , great service , really good size portions and very reasonably priced too , staff were very attentive , quick service and all were very satisfied with the food they had delivered to them . This restaurant is part of a new hotel complex . You won't be disappointed if you go !

Our room was damp and smelt absolutely vile , the bed sheets were filthy ; stained with blood and grime . The food was awful , microwaved and over priced . The staff couldnt give two hoots about service and looked like they would rather be at home .
We stay in this Ibis Hôtel 2 nights , the breakfast is very basic but the situation and the person who was at the lobby was very efficient and nice !

Very pleased with my choice at Mercure Harvestland Kuta . Every aspect was excellent except for the occasional foul smell from either the room toilet or air conditioning . The staff at reception desks , security and restaurant provides service with a smile . Highly recommended .

It ' s great considering the value for money and location . Great Budget Hotel Its in between two of the major shopping mall , discovery and lippo mall . and all the good restaurants are nearby . Swimming pool zone is not yet properly opened . And it gets closed by 6 PM , which is very early . There is no air ventilation inside the Life which is a bit suffocating sometimes .

very good located , the hotel needs maintenance and renewal . they have bugs and cockroaches . I would not recommend breakfast ( although only 6 euro ) Not many choices for dinner and not the best taste . . Hotel was not expensive , got what I paid . the free WIFI was very good ! ! !

Stayed at this hotel for 3 nights . Is very nice and clean . Close to the beach and has a lovely pool . Has everything you need in the room - fridge , aircon , hot water , TV etc . . . Breakfast is included in the price and is nice enough . The only bad thing is we were on the ground floor and there is HEAPS of mosquitos .

The hotel has a direct access to dreamland beach . The staff is very helpful and kind . Breakfast is a mix of indonesian and western cuisine . The rooftop pool is beautiful and never too busy . We had a great time overall . We rented a scooter at the reception .

Service was great , everyone was extremely friendly , food exceptional especially yuni at the bar she was very helpful . I had an hour wait while waiting for my room to be ready . She made it feel like 5mins with excellent service , genuine conversation and big smile . I wish her all the best in all of her endeavors .

A very clean n cozy hotel . . . good water shower with nice hot water . . . fast internet , good tv cable channel . . . food for the room service is delicious n reasonable price . . . Comfortable room n bed . . .

Good room everyday new linnen , the badroom can be cleaner . Near the mall , also near the good restaurants , only a few minutes walk to the mall next door . Not to far from the Ngurah Rai airport , 15 minutes by taxi .

Everything in here is good . . all about hospitality here is perfect . Close by kuta . Night club . Shopping centre and cinemas . Breakfast . Room . Staff . Hotel area is good . Thank you for every single all of you make our stay is memorable .

We stayed at kuta central park hotel for 6 days . When we booked our stay they had a promo which is book 5 days + 1 night free stay . With the inclusion of two way airport transfer and 10 % discount on food and beverages . The location is good as well as the food and and room amenities .

* It was a good and relaxing experience . . * Room was spacious . * the View from the balcony was amazing . * Swimming pool was good . * Room service was so good . * Shuttle services ! * Absolutely worth every penny !

Good hotel . 15 min walk to the beach . We had no view from the balcony but was a fair deal for the price . They could have refilled the soap and stuff in the bathroom . Beds were good and breakfast was oke . Staff was very kind !

If you want something a bit cheaper and arent fussed by all the fanciness of the 5 star places this is a great place to stay . It ' s walking distance to the beach , shops , market stalls , restaurants . Breakfast was included and was so delicious . Love it !

We were offered free leg massage during our booking but they did not care to offer the service though . Close to Kuta beach and Beach walk mall . Airport can be reached in 15 to 15 mind . Location is the only plus . No lift to 2nd and 3rd floors . Difficult to get the luggage up and down .

Very good to stay at fame hotel sunset road . The staff are really kind , helpful , and give an excellent services . Also the room is very clean and comfortable . And the hotel are located in strategic place which is good .

This hotel is clean , staff is friendly , rooms are small but the price is low compared to other places in that area . It ' s a good hotel for very reasonable prices . Motorbike rental here is little too expensive compared to other places .

Have had an awesome time in bali made even better by the kindness and helpfulness of the staff . Nothing was ever too much trouble , wifi was a bit touch and go and different fruit for breakfast would have been nice but that ' s it .
Room was nice and clean although they could do with some new sheets , clean but old . Fantastic location . Pool was good , nice and cold . Food was okay for the price , room service was prompt .

Its location is close to the airport , only about 30 minutes , providing airport shuttle , very surprised when entering the elevator there is a distinctive smell as well as entering the room . overall this hotel is pretty good but the swimming pool is very small and room 106 is very noisy from the vehicle because it faces the road .

Nice hotel in indonesian style . Great service and good location . Pharmacy , mini market , bike rental , small restaurant are all the next door . A little bit far from beach , but very quietly place . The only thing I didn ' t like was breakfast .

This place was terrible . . . What you see in the pictures online and what you get are worlds apart . . . I would advise anybody considering this hotel to book elsewhere . . . The only this I can say that was good about this hotel was the buffet breakfast but that doesn't make up for the quality of the rooms . . .
Family all had steak sandwiches which were nothing to rave about . I had the sate which was quite nice . Grill smoke was blowing through the restaurant . Staff were friendly and helpful .

I stayed here last week with two friends , we knew that it was quiet isolated which was fine but the restaurant food was dreadful and they ran out mixes for the cocktails . On the plus side the breakfast was really good and the spa treatments were wonderful , it would have been nice if we had a kettle in our room and the rooms I think were over priced .

The price per night at Suka beach is very cheap compared to what we would pay at home for the same thing yet it is Bali so we expected a better standard for what we paid . The facilities in terms of pool and dining room are really good but our room and deck were not very clean .

Somewhat dirty room , leaking toilet , power cut at 6am for more than 30 minutes ( apparently the engineer wasn ' t there to start the Genset ) and then the water ran out for a further 30 minutes ( as pump had no power . Won ' t be back . The only redeeming feature , the breakfast included excellent Black Bali coffee !

Near shopping spots , Lippo Mall Kuta and plenty of restaurants . Although the elevators need fixed , our room was comfortable . This is affordable hotel that has many choices of international television channels .

The staffs were friendly . Really fast check in and check out procedure . I got a free late check - out up to 5 pm as an Accor member . The room was nice but still not as elegant as other Mercure hotel room that I ' ve ever stayed . It seemed that it was one level below another Mercure standard . Breakfast was OK , but not so many choices .

It ' s always good to be back to Bali and stay with this property . easy access to reach and find place to hang out Makes me fully rested and warm staff , with limited breakfast need to make sure all the items refill all the time .

This hotel has an awesome location and wonderful gardens ( the only thing that seems to be properly maintained ) . But apart from that everything seems to be falling apart and needs some care . Rooms are cold ( in atmosphere , not temperature ) , plain / loveless interior , shower / sink / taps etc need maintenance , lots of ants in our room . . . Staff are friendly though .

Great and helpful staffs . It was raining when I arrived there . The security kindly asked me to go straight to check in counter and offered himself to park my motorcycle . The room was clean and nice . The room service was also great .

Stayed here for a night . Like d reviews say it is clean , new and affordable price . Only 1 complain is that from inside the ( small ) room you can hear voices outside as it isn ' t very well sound proof - ed . Apart from that it ' s great !

WE GET MORE THAN WE PAY , . . We stayed here for 5 nights . Valuable stay , nice location , profesional service from the staff and good breakfast . Near to the airport but need to take taxi to kuta beach around 20 thousand rupiah . We ' ll stay here again if come to Bali .

We arrived late and were greeted with both friendly smiles and helping hands . Although we only stayed two nights I would be happy to recommend this boutique hotel . Although there was lots of breakfast foods they were not hot enough .
Really like this hotel cuz can sleep well till noon always dark 😅 Little bit problem that we have to take shower downstair but got toilet too upstairs . Will back to this hotel again . Recommended .

This hotel is good for budget conscious travellers . The staff was friendly and nice . The facilities were clean but a bit old . Motorcycle and taxis are plentiful on the road . I avoid the motorcycle as they overcharge . Agree on the price before getting on a motorcycle ! Personally , I prefer the comfort of the taxis , it really much more cheaper .

Stayed in this place due to delayed flight . Cheap hotel , you get what you pay for . Bathroom was very dirty , horrible breakfast , had to search for batman to get a drink at pool bar on various occasion then served in glass full of previous clients lipstick .

We stayed at The Solaris after getting a good deal online . The room was clean , however needs some good TLC . The bed was big and comfy , the bathroom was basic and in need of some maintenance . Based on the price , and other places I have stayed for a similar price I would rate this hotel average . Not amazing , not terrible .
unfortunately , good location and other good things was useless when u serve a terrible breakfast . i hope u serve a better breakfast , in sight of quallity , quantity and variety .
The property was very nice and clean they just opened so it was a lil disorganized room service was very slow once we had to Waite 2hrs for food .

This hotel has an Excellent service . They have Polite and accommodating staff . They Clean the room everyday and extend their helping hand anytime you need them . Nice rooftop bar with a pool . Its accessible to everything . Good atmosphere and quiet at night .

The room is quite old and the environment is not so good . Cleanliness is just average . Room bathroom is pld therefore does not look too clean . And the room flooring is not made of carpet . You can hear noises from next door easily . Breakfast quality is below standard . Swimming pool is just average .

I got chance to visit my friend who stayed this hotel . Food at the cafe is delicious . Cozy and unique ambiance . DIMAS is the best . He go extra miles to pleased the guest for picture taken . Love this place so much . . . . highly recommended .

A nice little quiet hotel . Great rooms with working aircon , working enough that I got cold at night . A fair walk to the main drag though , but if you walk the beach then its a nice walk . First timers , dont let beach sellers into the hotel , if you are going to buy , got out to them . And be sure to visit the dolphins .
I stayed in the hotel for 4 days march 08 - to 13 Rooms were good but lack Furniture like Sofa / chairs .

A real gem , boutique and quaint very Balinese . The staff are lovely and the price is right . The pool is not huge but is clean and surrounded by lovely gardens . We would stay here again as it was very good value for money . The meals too were good value .

A very nice place in Kuta with a very good restaurant vibes . You can chill and walk to go to the beach and the place is very strategic . Need to improve the choice of food for breakfast as i found it a bit boring .

Waiting for reservation took us about 20 minute just to complete . Breakfast no choice at all and the meal was cold . Drink finished no refill and table with Dirty stained . Room do not have any phone . We had suspected to smoke in the room and they refuse to return the deposit to us . Well . it is a very bad experience for us in bali to stay in this hotel .

Definately awesome of you are on a budget , we had a deluxe unit but for a family of three id definitely recommend a villa , but in saying that , we had no problems , staff was nice , breakfast filled the gap and the pool lovely . . .

Nice Hotel . Close to mall and beach . Really helpful and friendly staff . Good breakfast , for those who love Asian food . Nice pool though seems smaller than on the pictures . The room is nice . Clean and has a good bed .

This is a great hotel right on the water front . Rooms are large with the usual facilities . No kettle in room but if you ask it is available . If you like partying the hotel is right opposite Finns night club possible the biggest night club in the world .

The bed was the only good thing in the room there was no where to put your clothes , if your a couple staying more than a week you would go crazy . The breakfast was terrible and we were stupid enough to go to there barbeque night please keep your money and go somewhere else The roof top pool was good but no atmosphere .
Amazing stay . with good breakfast and good maintenance , cleanliness . Hotel staffs were polite and hospitality was appreciable . Must visit hotel for stay . .

Fantastic stay here . Wifi a little dodgy in rooms but great in lobby . Buffet breakfast pretty good selection . Roof top pool . About 10 - 15 min walk to the action in Kuta . Would stay here again . Airport transfers included in package staff went over and above and remembered my name .

Went here for a holiday with friends last week and had dinner in the hotel restaurant . Food was so bad and expensive . I ordered steak which was so hard to chew and made me wanna spit out . Pictures on the menu looks deceiving . Never coming back again .

There will minor flood in the bathroom everytime i had shower . Am travelling with 4 kids but there is no kettle provided . Whenever they want milk we had to order hot water from receptionist but the will only sent a mug of hot water .

We stayed 3 nights for family vacation . Hotel location near discovery mall , many restaurants , beach . Friendly staff but hotel quality is below average for us . Some bathroom door had no door knobs , room paint not good , breakfast tasted average . For cheap hotel , Rp . 420 . 000 at peak season , that was what we got .
This hotel is priced well for what you get . Nice pool and well priced food , beer and snacks . Be nice if they spend a bit more on maintenance though . Showers in the bathroom are not good .

Its locate in the center . Near the Kuta beach and Ngurah Rai Airport . We can find ATM and supermarket easily . Its also near the mall and the spa . . . I highly recommend the variety of the food for breakfast . but overall it was a nice experience staying here .

happines and enjoy to staying in this hotels , near from Kuta beach , shopping centre , cullinnary . Room and other facility was clean , front office and the staff team are so helpfull , its pleasure to staying in fave hotel Kartika plaza .

Warm place to stay friendly staff , have a relax at rooftop pool its so comfort with good music from bar , good friendly service from the bartender mr . Agus , pool not so busy so you can enjoy your time here .

10 min walk to the bounty nightclub and all the rest of the bars . Walk out of the hotel and start shopping its so close ! 5 min walk to the beach ! Rooms wer cleaned everyday and change of towels . Free wifi was a plus and room service food was pretty nice ! Overall my stay at Dekuta was amazing and will defiantly be returning ! !

Rooms are old and look shabby , they urgently need a renovation . The bathroom was horrible , dirty and broken . The restaurant was bad . One star left , but only for this fabulous view of Mount Batur and the lake . Kintamani itself is not recommended .

good location , near from every places that all guest need . great and friendly staff is a plus fr this hotel , really like the breakfast menu too verry like it with their variant and will be back again fr my next holiday . .

Thoroughly impressed with how genuine the staff were , how amazing the layout of not only the hotel but also the rooms . I would definitely come again soon , it ' s worth the visit ! I highly recommend this hotel , it truly embodies the culture and essence of Bali .
The hotel is just nice . Nearby to airport and tourist attractions as well . Easy to get food and not so crowded .

Good location , place & value . . . Clean & Quiet to stay . . . Maintenance must be improve by routine and periodic inspections , especially drainage in the sink and bathroom after guests check out . Reservations staff must improve their skills ( language ) .

Very nice 3 star accommodation . New rooms well appointed and clean . Shower in bath , which some may not like . Very friendly staff and great restaurant with bands each night . Lovely gardens . Pool could do with a bit of an upgrade and more pool chairs needed . Also personally would prefer a designated non smoking area in restaurant .
Cheap and cheerful , having eaten a lot of crap in Kuta , the Nebula bar and restaurant has the best food by a mile , will definitely be back again .

a great rooftop swim and gym while we had to extend our stay due to the volcano delaying our trip home . Had a book a family room at the last minute at this came up at a good price . Limited restaurant choices around but main priority was a clean bed , space and easy access to the airport .
The hotel is very recommended for travelling with low budget . But the room not really big . The staffs are very nice and helpfull , the hotel facilities quiet complete with pool .

Room was not very nice - bed sheets and pillowcases stinky and old . . . room smelled really musty . . . staff very friendly and helpful though . Location fine for walking to beach - 12 mins with 2 yr old . Breakfast ok - eggs good but everything else not too tasty . Would probably look for something else next time in that area if ever .

We stayed at Solaris kuta for 8 nights , we arrived to an extremely friendly efficient front desk they had us in our room within minutes of arriving . Our room was the smaller of the rooms available but we found it more than enough . Beautiful crispy clean white sheets and towels plenty of toiletries and tea and coffee .

Its 1 night type of place , enjoyed the views , rooms were nice , but showers were old and grim . Super loud , surrounded by roads - 24 / 7 motorbikes - maybe best for trecking the volcano so you dont have to sleep for long .

Excellence in service and comfort . Dolphin Trip only great in clear skies . Not too much to do in walking distance to hotel but you can take a ride ( provided by hotel ) to local market . Food is expensive for Indonesia but good .

I visited to this hotel on feb 2017 with my husband . we had made a online booking . The place was nice but room were pretty run down and not so clean . The breakfast there was good and its near to many beach and shopping malls and also very close to Airport .

I only stayed for 3 nights at the beginning of my holiday , and was only in Legian to shop so this hotel was perfectly located for that purpose . My room was clean and functional , with good A / C . I didn ' t have breakfast included but I did order room service and I felt the servings were quite small .

Great staff , clean room , clean public area , good breakfast , so close to the beach , shops and restaurants and very cheap . And very quiet as well ! We stayed four different hotels ( most expensive one was $ 260p / n ) this trip , this was the best one and cheapest one . We ' ll be back . All so good . Thank you .

Stayed here for 5 nights over Christmas ! Great hotel , big pool with comfy sun beds and lovely staff always happy to help ! Room service is also very good here ! We will be recommending to friends and family !

We stayed in this hotel for 5 nights . I have to say everything was much better than in the pictures ! Everything was amazing . The hotel is clean and everyone is so nice and welcoming . The breakfast was one of the best parts . The food in the restaurant is good . I would definitely stay here again .

Very quiet and well insulated hotel . The staff was very helpful with special requests to make my stay perfect . I requested an early check in and late check out and the couldn ' t have been any nicer . I used the concierge to book a driver for a day trip .

Booked this place through Agoda and got decent price for it . As the title says , you get what you pay for , so I ' m not complaining . Towels were changed everyday , rooms were clean , and staff were friendly . Near to eateries as well .

Wow I do not have the time of day to list everything wrong here ! ! Disgusting service horrible rooms gross food ! ! Exploding taps In the bathroom at 3am with no staff to help sercurity say " come back in the morning " if my money is refundable I would have left to the Aromas next door ( excellent ) .
I had a short visit to Kuta . Only 5 mins each walk from the famous Kuta Square and Beach walk where I had my morning run . Breakfast is ok . Room facility is beyond my expectation .

Nice hotel , clean , comfort , and i think its quite cheap while others hotel raise their rate . I got a room with 2 single beds , AC , water heater , WiFi , TV . But dont expect nice view from your window , dont ever expect a swimming pool . I give 5 stars for the clean room , comfortable .

We stayed here with friends as part of a wedding and were made to feel very welcome . The lovely staff and pool area is definitely a bonus . Rooms are very basic , with the bathrooms being very outdated . Other than the rooms itself , the rest of the hotel is great ! Convenient location down a side alley in the heart of Legian .

Rooms are huge , beds are comfortable . The food at the hotel is really good , has good facilities such as pool and gym , it is in a good location and is just a short walk into Legian street . The staff are amazing and really friendly . This hotel is toddler friendly as it has a playground and kids room , the staff are also really good with little kids !

The room was ok , not so great but it is not the worst either , balcony view just facing the buildings . The food at the restaurant was good , we enjoyed the food everyday for the 5 days we stayed there .

By far the best hotel I have been to in indonesia . Best price for what you get . Very cheap , but awesome rooms . Also nice pool . You can also rent a scooter from the hotel . You don ' t pay more than ~ 60 or 70 thousand irp for the taxi from and to the airport .

The hotel is located in prominent area in Kuta . So cozy actually but when i was in room that i was able to heard noises a lot when people were going around , laughing and even talking i could hear clearly .

Great Stay ! Great Pool Area . Great Room . Great Restaurant . Hired a Scooter and drove around Uluwatu . Really nice ! Definitely hire a scooter if staying here though ! Very close to Dreamland Beach , and not far to Finn ' s Beach Club . Also not far to the temple .

We have decided to book something close to the airport after the 18 hour flight . Thankfully we were able to have a good deal with Klapa Resort and no disappointments at all . Great location ( yes it is out at nowhere near but we knew that ) close to beach with direct access . Staff were extremely friendly and accommodating all the time . Food was good and tasty .

Beautiful hotel with a great service & friendly staff . We had such a great experience in this hotel . The location is very strategic and made us easily going every where we wanted . Definitely will come back again in near future .

Had a great stay at Ibis Legian , staff could do with a little training in English , will return again soon . Location is ideal to beach and markets , also lovely restaraunts with great range of foods , very cheaply priced .

Well it ' s not that bad . The staffs are very friendly . Only one problem . The water is salty and very salty . The best part of the hotel is the location . Just opposite of the hotel you can find more or less everything . Live music with good food and cheap shopping all are in the same area .

Hotel seemed OK at first . However we had vomit all down our wall from the previous visitors . Had to ask 3 tines for it to be cleaned . Igarettes were also left in the room . Wouldn ' t even give us a discount for the poor cleanliness . Pool needs some serious renovation .
good property at good location . neat n clean & big rooms good breakfast and rooftop restaurent very bad n non cooperative staff . i was waiting from 11 amanx they gave me room at 2 : 45 pm .

My room on 1209 , the room too small and also bathroom . . . but quality of sleep is good because we get quiet room , and my key card for open the door is error and make me twice asking to reception . . . if you traveller with family I not recommend this hotel , if you single or couple traveller is ok .

Not being a surfer myself I still managed to really enjoy my 2 day stay here . Easy to walk along the beach to different bars and food , and great service when staying in . The food is good , and rooms well kept for the price .

Located in central area but in quiet road . Very close to beach . Room were big and nice . Room amenities were up to date . Pool was very good and they let us swim at midnight too . Staff were very attentive and pleasant . Breakfast was very poor and few choices . Need to improve on it . Great stay and highly recommended .

This was not a hotel to use as a holiday base . However it was cheap . $ 39 USD + + Unfortunately not well kept . The pool was unusable , covered in leaves and sticks , hard to see in the photos . Sun beds have no cushions and no sun . 25 minutes walk to the beach . Not explored outside yet .

It is a nice hotel , with a nice staff , great breakfast . But it ' s very business oriented , so don ' t expect many leasury amenities . The air conditioner was nor good enough . The gym was pretty basic . But in the end it was a very good hotel .

The location is very strategic . But unfortunately , the room is not soundproof . I got a room with connecting door and I heard the conversation from another room clearly . I had bad sleep quality bcos of the noise .

My trip to Bali for second time for own business staying at this hotel due on my villa arround . The Bread on breakfast qualiy need improvement has leaftover from the day before . You need a chef who can control your food more detail .

the first room near the pool leaked with water from the barthroom light . So they showed us 3 more rooms and they had mould everywhere on the roof , had to move our own bags to the other room and we booked tripple share and all they could do was put a mattress on the floor .

The room is comfortable and fit for uninterruptible rest . Its staff is friendly & helpful . I personally recommend this hotel even for long stayers . Convenient stores are nearby but choices of restaurant is limited .

Very good hotel to stay in Bali , hotel staff is very helping . You can ask for any help . Food was good , good to stay with family as well . Hotel location is not far from Kuta night club and beach .

Strategic location . Near from kuta and seminyak . But the room is so small . Good for a few days . I stay for one night . I was confused with the parking area . It ' s like you can parking everywhere but there are many stores . . .

This hotel is similar to Ibis Budget , no frills but with Indonesia breakfast and continental selection . Close to a BMC money changer and Discovery mall . They have a roof deck pool and beach is walking distance . Lots of places to eat nearby and convenience stores .

desperately need to replace pool furniture / cushions they are a disgrace , and not healthy . Pool could do with a bit of repair / clean . the staff and location is great , rooms big but could be cleaner in bathrooms . It is a very cheap place and not bad for what you pay .

This is our second stay at the Ibis Legian and would recommend this hotel . It is good value for money and a great location for shopping and the beach . The breakfast is limited but covers off what you would normally eat at home . We will stay again .

i stayed here for my business trip , this was the second time i have been here . the hotel is great , near from airport or other activity , so i can spend my spare time in kuta beach walk , and the hotel provide free shuttle . i was staying in superior room and very good value to stay , also the hotel provide free good connection wifi .

Do not things find another hotel budget around Legian Beach , Amaris Legian is the hotel , you can get anything around the hotel area . Mostly , I spent my holiday all the time out of the hotel so that why i choose Amaris Legian . Hotel cleanliness are average , so dusty around the hotel ( there is hotel project near from my room ) .

Good place to stay if you will just sleep there and not spend too much time in the hotel . Good area to stay and very safe area even if you walk in the wee hours of the morning . Happy to have stayed in this hotel .

The facilities are bit old . Value for money . nice area . good breakfast , nice pool , good for families with kids . Use Grab app for traveling short distances . If using for airport drivers will cheat by producing a fake parking for 50000 rp .
The rooms were neat and clean even though the beds were a little small . It is very near to the beach and also to the shopping area .

I couldn ' t find a Internet Café in that part of Legian and asked if I could use the ones for their clients . It was no problem , as long I bought a drink . Very helpful staff and I was grateful . Have looked at the Hotel and would stay when next in Bali .

This hotel has amazing customer service and the staff will do anything for you . The room cost us £7 each for one night . That was for four people . The only downside was the walls are very thin and you get a lot of outside noise .
Staff very friendly , helpfull , and always smile . . The facillities was good . . . . The pool very nice . . We can see the sun set in the corner . . . The location good . .

Peaceful surroundings , helpful staff , so - so breakfast , large rooms and bathrooms , large pool but quite far from any other attractions . Me and hubby didn ' t mind because we like quiet place for getaway .

Stayed here for our wedding anniversary and we just LOVED the rooftop pool and bar , it was awesome ! The breakfast was not bad . Location is in kartika plaza which is close to Discovery Shopping Mall and kuta beach , bunch of good restaurants along the road .

I stayed there for 2 days , hotel is nice & clean , staff is very decent & helpful . Our room overlooking to the swimming pool , it was good . The hotel is near the airport , which is a good choice for ppl comes from a long trip .

booked at last time based on published rating , as whole package quite nice and also affordable reasonable hotel . but when i already booked even last time . . the process in front office a little bit to long . and unfortunately the bed sheed n pillow cover have a bad smell . n the room door seems very old coz maybe not clean .

I booked this hotel for my sisters . . They said the room are clean and well decorated , the breakfast was good ( no pork menu in it ) , the area are very lively . . Overall it was an enjoyable stay for them . .

Arrived at this hotel looking forward to a luxury beachfront stay . Stayed 5 mins and demanded a full refund ! Tiny basement rooms with no window or bathroom . The stench of sewerage was so overpowering we left immediately . Found a beautiful hotel 5mins down the road with a sunset view from our window at a cheaper rate .

Pool area is very small and one day it was so dirty that it was not possible to swim . Hotel is clean but need little reform . Compared to local prices and level , hotel is expensive . if you have window / balcony to street you hear motorbikes noise all night . Because the swimming pool area is so little and not sunny , i cant recommend that family with children .
Front office staff are friendly . . location are front kuta beach . . but the place already old . Cleaning so bad . Breakfast place too old not rekomended . .

The room facilities is totally out of my expectation . The furniture is tired and old . The worst part of room is the room got bad smell . I can ' t sleep at the first night I checked in . I should have a wonderfully trip in Bali , but the room is really upset me .

On planning our 10 day holiday in Bali , we decided to do the online booking for 3 days only . Just as well otherwise we would have had a miserable stay in a dark room with very little sunlight , even the balcony is bricked up .

Have stayed here numerous times now . Definately will return in the near future . Rooms are great , close to all amenities , lippo mall , the beach and local stores are a walk away . Food is great here at the restaurant .

We stayed 2 nights , for the price , we were more than happy with the facilities , it ' s clean , and the staff were excellent . The bedrooms are small and could do with a bit of character . The breakfast was basic , could do with a bit more variety .

hotel room was fine : ) room rate is ok . worth the price . maybe will stay here again for business trip . breakfast can be improved with more various menu . overall i enjoyed my stay . thank you : ) . . . . . .

We stayed here for 4 Days 3 Nights . We really enjoyed at the pool and the staff were attentive and friendly . The breakfast spread was just average and not much of choices . Room was really big , spacious and very comfortable . Room service was efficient . Location was great and they provided free shuttle service to beach ! Overall we have great time at here .

Thanks for the accomodation , very nice stay and holiday . Thank you Pak Sammy and teams . The room was big and fine for my family . Nice swimming pool , good access for travelling , close to the airport also .
All interior design is superb . . great service . . too bad no free breakfast . . and the bed is way too soft so my back feel hurts when i got up in the morning . . hope you can fix this up . .

We stayed for 2 days , overall its nice considering the reasonable price , breakfast was good . different menu everyday . however i asked for corner room and they confirmed it , but we get different room then we requested . overall Its a good stay .

The people where friendly but not all of them capable . The breakfast is average and the service was a bit chaotic . The rooms are very clean and good maintained . We booked a room for 1 night because of the major discount ( last minute ) and that ' s why it was ok , if I had paid the normal price I would be disappointed .

Beds are great , they could add some extra pillows , the staff will try and fix almost anything , the bathrooms are really nice although it take for ever for the hot water to come threw . The pools are nice and clean and the water is warm as ts hits the day sun . there are a few sun beds but most have holes and there is only like 6 in total .

Staffs are friendly and helpful , location is strategic , rooftop pool is excellent . Breakfast buffet was delicious ; especially their fried instant noodle and fried rice . Room is spacious that it could fit two more pax in it .

Wonderful , attentive staff . Each person I interacted with was quite pleasant and helpful - from front desk to room service . Good location . Great breakfast included adds to the value . I definitely recommend .

Incredible view Nice staff Food is good Close to everything Rent a motorbike to visit Uluwatu , Padang Padang beach , Benoa beach , Kuta and many more The hotel will help you with pleasure to create an amazing day !

Not worth the money And you can get better meals elsewhere For that price . Not that great For speaking English . I had to send my spring rolls back three times Because they had cucumber Underneath the spring rolls And I am allergic . I will not return to this place for food .

Something about this place is magical . It ' s understated , elegant , calm and beautiful . Great staff , good , location . I ' ll be back , It was really worth each dollar i spent in the hotel . the service was highly over what I expect .

I stayed a night here based on recommendation in lonely planet and online . I stayed one night then moved to a place up the road . The place itself is fine , but the room was pretty bad . It smelled really musty and the sheets were very old and stained . The staff are friendly , pool nice and breakfast pretty good . But the room was a deal breaker .

The hotel is quite beautiful and the pool bar is dangerously inviting . Breakfast is a feast and staff quite friendly . We booked a superior room for only $ 4 dollars more and had a great and comfortable room with loads of space and pool view . Definitely recomended ! !

I really loved favehotel , I stayed for eight nights , the staff were super friendly . I had dinner with them several times . They have tasty and fresh food . The location is great ! I highly recommended if you want a budget hotel , I liked the pool at the roof top . Thank you !

The location is easy to find . The room is comfy , but the cleaning was not too detail so I found some ants in my bath rooms . The staff are helpfull . Great place to stay for holiday . For all this is a recomended hotel .

Went there with my hubby n 2 kiddos . Located in kuta near Ngurah Rai Airport . Stayed at Deluxe room with xtra bed . But i suggest you dont add any extrabed with this type of room . . because it was sooo tight . . . the food are good . . nice pool , and they have shuttle . .

Located near dreamland beach n acroos of golf field . This hotel with 2 pool give our kids satisfaction . The only problem is difficult to find some streetfood . Near GWK statue and uluwatu temple . Breakfast is good .

Hotel was in good location near by supermarket , cheap price with good facility such as swimming pool and chargeable boat to see dolphin on the sea . The only thing need to improve is WiFi connection was so slow , for foreign guest WiFi will be the most important thing they will need while traveling .

Hotel is in a great location , quiet , in Umalas , half way between Seminyak and Canggu . Some deferred maintenance , very nice rooms , excellent linens , two story rooms and excellent for the price , around 30 dollars per night , rollaway 200 , 000 Ru extra . Pool is good . Do not eat in the restaurant .

the hotel is located near the beach and shopping area . Walking distance to pizza n other restaurants . the bed and bathroom was clean . But only the breakfast was boring . Same menu everyday . the environment of hotel at night is very lively .

At au $ 30 a night , you get what you pay for but it's a good little hotel . Air con , clean room and breakfast . Beds were a bit hard but shower pressure in bathroom was good . Good location - very close to shops , cafes and spas .

I would give 5 / 5 for the interior design . The room concept is so unique and i like it very much . But as others said the cleanliness only 3 / 5 . The floor is dusty and i found stain on the pillow sheet . Its such a dissapointment : ( for the pools . .

I stayed in this hotel on my last business trip . the hotel is efficient and offer me everything that I need . The room is spacious with a balcony ( a great view to the swimming pool ) , the breakfast is good and the staff are friendly .

The staff are very happy , friendly and helpful . You have a day spa upstairs with a very good masseuse . Food is very well cooked . Air con works great . Shower prone to flooding if running too hard . A lot of fun places to visit nearby and very close to beach !

We cannot thank you enough for everything you did for our wedding . We appreciate all of the planning and behind - the - scenes work that made our families are happy to stay in Le Grande Hotel . . . Thank you for helping to make our special day so memorable ! Best of luck in the future , Mbak Maydia . . !

The rooms are exceptional . Very good service from the hotel manager and staff , very helpful and friendly . The location is great if you are looking for a quiet place to just relax and enjoy nature . it was a pleasure staying Le Grande . Would love to come stay here again .

Beds were very poor quality my girlfriend . . . who is a big girl broke 3 beds . . staff were friendly and pool was clean . Walls very thin and yo can hear everything . . . if you hold a glass very still . . .

Stayed here for 1 night in July . Rooms were clean and beds were set up as requested for my family on arrival . Breakfast was lovely with a wide variety and Danny on the front desk was welcoming and professional . Close to the airport too .

Solaris is a modern and nice hotel in Kuta , the staff is super friendly and they always are ready to help you . . . Pool , toilets , rooms are clean and always tidy . . . Well done Solaris ! ! Solaris is a modern and nice hotel in Kuta , the staff is super friendly and they always are ready to help you . . .

It ' s very new in Kuta area . It ' s clean , simplicity , stylish . The room is beautiful with purple color decorations . The guy that picked up us at the airport is friendly and courtesy . The only shortage is a little noisy due to its location close to the airport and the road .

The location and landscaping in the hotel is amazing . loved it . have a large swimming pool . Had some bad experience as well . One of the salad in the buffet was old and stinky . definitely i would have had bad stomach that day . so be careful what you eat at this hotel . very bad .

Room was nice , clean and comfort to stay for holiday in bali . Wifi was good , fadilities is good worth to pay with excelent fasilities like a refrig available in the room good price and excelent service staff . The breakfast was delicious just need more variant of the menu .

The exterior and lobby are great looking , however the rooms are in fairly bad looking shape . We only stayed here one night but the staff was friendly and helpful . The location was also great if you ' re interested in staying near the night life in Kuta as there was a band playing next door . Great price - - got what we paid for .

It a good hotel , friendly and cheap . But can be found it is old . Thought clarks are nice , but cleaning did not do well . Someone left trash in my bar fridge before we arrive , that means cleaners didn ' t check all the room when they were working .

One of the worst hotel in BALI ! Bar Service - Really bad , Quality of drinks really bad once ordered drink had just ice n ice . Room - dirty and not really disappointing Bad internet & room service Staff - service was terrible HIGHLY DON'T recommend this PLACE !

This is my second visit , very good hotel from my perception , i have got what I need , nice receptionist especially . very good breakfast i thinks they have a lot choice of foods . over all better . and comfortable to stay here .

It was Nyepi 2013 and we were stay there to hide with all family and my baby boy . Room was nice with an interconecting door . service was pretty quick when we had problem with our room key card . Restaurant was small but good service and the buffet was not bad at all .

The Ozz Hotel is a nice property in Kuta . The room was very comfortable and clean , though the pillows were a bit large . The hotel had a very good pool and a very friendly staff . If you want to stay in Kuta near the beach , I would recommend this place .

Great hotel team always welcoming . Suki , Linna , Tris and Elly are fantastic , they will assist you with any requests . Located centrally . Can be noisey due to guests talking loudly in corridors . Close to convenience store .

Modern , Clean , great location . Close to Reef Break , Lots of good little restaurants ( Warongs ) nearby Nice Buffet Breakfast , the pool is long enough to swim laps . You won ' t beat this one for value , we tried a few other Kuta Hotels that were around the same price and they were smelly dumps .

I think , everything about this hotel is good and of course with affordable price . Everything in my room goes well . air conditioner , balcony , swimming pool , breakfast , and I really recommended you . The location is good to , near sunset road .

Before continuing my travel on my arrival from Europe I stayed at this hotel near the airport to handle a jet leg and to relax . I had a wonderful good time at the pool , chatting with the ever so kind and interested staff , using the free shuttle service to a shopping mall at the beach and enjoying good food , drinks and massages . Loved the pool !

Rooms need more soundproofing . Can hear noise from people talking outside , doors closing and toilets flushing . Our room smelt a bit musty but were spacious and clean . Fridge didn ' t work but was quickly fixed Some towels not clean but were changed . Rooftop pool was nice in evening .

This is a very good hotel , clean and big room and friendly staff , the only thing is the location , which is a little far from the beach but we walked the day that we stayed there . The breakfast was buffet but is more Asian food than western . I recommended only for the room .

I have stayed in Pandawa for 2 weeks and was very pleased . It was clean , staff was friendly . Only internet was weak . Also we didn ' t like food . Breakfast was so weak and wasnt tasty at all . I advice future costumers to eat out .
Clean rooms . . . Very low water pressure in our room . . . We had a 2nd story room and could see the water . . . Was impressed with massage . . . All in all clean and tidy . . .

Although it isn ' t located at main street , but its location is easy to reach and find . This room and bathroom are big enough . It has an outdoor swimming pool . It is very comfortable staying here . The room rate also very reasonable .

It is a beautiful hotel . I personally loves the room interior . But couldn ' t enjoy it more when on the very first and last night there i spent my bedtime scratching . And it were not mosquitos . They were bed bugs ! ! Nasty !

This hotel is in a fantastic location , with awesome views to the lake and the volcanos . The room was nice , simple and clean , and the service was kind . But the bathrooms . . . . the bathrooms are terrible ! uncomfortable , with a feeling of dirtiness , nothing to hung a towel . . .

We didn ' t stay at the hotel , they have a nice restaurant out the front . Staff were friendly food was very presentable . Great spot to take a break from the hectic shopping , cool drinks mix juice was very nice .

Convenience and value for money hotel in Bali . Even Alea the new hotel in Bali , I believe You will find good experience . This time was my business trip . For sure improvement have to be done . I wish Alea will find the Identity .

This hotel was amazing ! A few steps from the beach , handy to McDonalds , Hard Rock , markets and everything ! And the staff were fantastic ! ! Super friendly , provided superb service - nothing was too big / too small / or too hard for them to help make our stay memorable ! Very big thank you to Linda and the crew for a truly awesome stay !

this is my first time stay at sun royal hotel . the location is moderate , close enough to small convenient store nearby to buy some snacks . overall the hotel is quite good , even though it could become very noise when a lot of rude quests play at the swimming pool at night .

This hotel have a good location near the kuta beach . We thirst got an old room with no air condition . After some calls to the reception we got a new room witch was much better . The new room was good cleaned with a renovated bathroom . And ner the pool area . The hotel stuff was very kindly .

the best hotel in bali below $ 50 / night and for $ 30 / night it is a real steal , I have been to bali many times and been to about 15 - 20 hotels and none are the level of this place and for the price it ' s really amazing !
Booked on line the pictures look great but when we got there it was not nice . overlooked a tip in other back yard .

Located in the central of Kuta . The decoration is modern and open . Enjoy sightseeing cos so close with discovery mall and Kuta beach . The room is not spacious but functional . You get all necessary things . The swimming pool is on roof top with nice scenery although not so big . You can just sit and chill out to feel lazy there . The breakfast is good .

First day , i think breakfast good enough but then the days after have the same variety and also the flavour too salty . . There is a waiter thats not friendly . He takes the baby chair from my table when i ' m stiil not done with it . . He said he didnt see the baby around there . . Also there is a cockroach in my room . .

- Really enjoy my staying there for 27 days 😜 . . Solaris stuff is really helpful . . thanks to juni , Yuni , Ryan , you guys doing awesome jobs . . thanks - Breakfast was buffet - style with limited continental food options .

Please make sure your F & B get the Halal certificate in order to respect your Muslim customer . Furthermore , your staff are friendly and helpful . My wife and me feel very comfort when staying at your room .

Family stayed here for 5 days , was nice clean and had interconnecting rooms . Can only fault the breakfast , staff were great and good location . . . Rooms are small but all you need for a good sleep .

Don ' t get a room with pool access . It ' s appealing but the noise won ' t stop until 11pm even though according to their rules it ' s 10pm . Staff is very helpful and breakfast buffet is excellent value so add it to your package . Very close to lots of amenities .

overall stay was enjoyable but water in toilet running slow and hand shower need maintenance . need to improve breakfast menu . location is perfect to visit our family in singaraja . I would recommended to my family and friends .

Hotel was very budget . Clean room but only one plug in bathroom . Shower didn ' t work properly and mould over bath . The Pool area looked nice and breakfast is buffet style , but not much to choose from again very budget . Mainly Indonesian visitors stated here not many westerners . Would stay again if only needed a room for the night .

Nice and close to the airport , staff were lovely , basic but nice rooms , spa was great and great value . Looks like an awesome pool with swim up bar which unfortunately I missed out on . Can ' t fault them on anything .

A lovely hotel where the staff could not do enough for you . The food was good . The hotel room was compact but spotless , it was cleaned twice a day . I would definitely return . The only downside was the seating in the reception was dated and there was only four sun beds . Overall it was a fantastic hotel !

My husband and I stayed here and loved it . The food was great , the service wonderful and the bed huge ! Highly recommend it . The massage was heaven ! When we had a mix up with payment refund the management did all they could to rectify the situation .

Not expensive hotel with a great service & good location , close to airport & malls , very helpful staff & taste Indonesian style breakfast . We took 2 rooms ( connection ) for two of us . I dont want to stay in big hotel , every time I go to Bali , so JBH is highly recommend for people who want stay away from big hotel .

The hotel is located at the very centre of main places of interest , malls , restaurants , kuta beach , all within walking distances , and just 5 minutes drive to airport . Nice , clean and pleasant room , with warm and friendly hotel staffs . Rooftop pool was nice too . Would consider to stay here for next visit .

good rooms decent price , only down side that our room had is that it did not have a open able window . the mall and everything else is a few minutes walk away from this place . their room decor is also pretty funky .

We only stayed one night to catch up with a friend but I was pleasantly surprised . For the price it was very good value . We got the bungalow ( room 12 ) right at the front facing the beach . Aircon great bed very comfy room great size . Yes I was very happy .

I stayed for 4 nights there . The service was amazing . I got a superior room , unfortunately the air conditioner was broken at that time . But they handled it right away . The staffs at the reception mostly friendly , even the one who seems like still on training . Good job Solaris ! For sure I will come back next time !

Warning ! do not be fooled by the photos this is a very nice scam . I booked a room with a very nice bed and a nice view and was given a scruffy room with bed sheets tearing with two separate beds and very poorly maintained and then I am told that I can not change rooms .

Not bad place to spend one night before or after the flight . The staff is helpful and nice AC , hot water , big bed but not very fresh linens one a towel . Good simple breakfast in a cafe outside was included .

Being a first timer in Bali we were assisted throughout our stay by the helpful staffs of the hotel ( Gede from transportation & Trisna from front desk ) . But we were taken aback by the surroundings of the hotel ( unoccupied shop houses ) which make it unpleasant to go out especialy at night .

Budget accomodation friendly staff , towels small & stained bathroom needs a really good scrub / bleach , sheets not changed every day , asked for extra towels & told " NO only 2 towels ! " , air conditioner set to 24 so disappointed can ' t change to cooler since it ' s so hot ! ! !

Popped in for a late lunch here and was not welcomed with the usual Bali style . Ordered Pad Thai and told it wasn ' t available so I had a Mee Goreng which was very plain and no extra sauces offered . This place has a great location but if you want quality and service look elsewhere .
Its totally worthed . . . cheap , clean , new room . . . nice food . . . n strategic location . . .

Good service , nice breakfast , clean and peaceful , nearby have Giant ( by walking distance only 5 - 10mins ) overall is worthy of price . Welcome dinner is just a very simple food , and free massage only average , but the hotel price consider worthy ( Around RM900 + - ) , travelling on last year Oct 2015 . Definitely can stay here with friends and family .

This is a rock solid facility on the water with excellent accommodations and delicious food . The staff are trained to make your stay memorable . We stayed in E - 6 with a private plunge pool , living - room and kitchenette ! Such a deal . . . seriously , it was .

This place is in a great location and is really cheap . The hotel is quite old and shabby looking but it is clean and the staff are very friendly . If I ' m short of cash i would stay here again but otherwise I think i would spend that little bit extra and stay somewhere a little newer .
nice hotel , not far from airport , free wi - fi , friendly staff but no view , no beach , nothing intersting with in walking distance from the hotel .

My friend arranged to booked this hotel because it was near from the airport to pick me up . The breakfast is standard . The room is clean . overall it was okay for me to spent two nights in this hotel . . .

had a very stress - free trip in bali with kuta central park hotel . we always leave early for a tour and they always provide our breakfast to go box . they provided the room that we requested and we were able to have a good rest for the next day adventure .

My family and i were staying for one night only , the location is perfect , beach side , front office staff are very friendly and helpful , wifi is excellent , the room is clean . The only facility that we didnt enjoy is the pool since it is under maintanance . However , everything is great and amazing experience staying at Pop .

A great location hotel with good price to stay in nearby Kuta . 5 minutes walk distance to Tuban beach and 10 minutes walk to well - known Kuta beach . Staff responsiveness is good . Receptionist was handling late check in very efficient . The hotel is located between two " Balinese " style mall where you can have window shopping while watching the Indian ocean .
Thank you so much was so great and would definitely recommend and return to this hotel . My favorite part was the rooftop pool and the restaurant . The rooms had everything you need in it .

Only last minute decision , we decided to pick Palm Beach for 1 night stay . The hotel staffs were friendly & helpful . For the area near Kuta , this place is clean , decent , well maintained , internet fast , walking distance in Kuta beach . Even we dont get the breakfast package , tons of place nearby & convenient stores around . The pool is amazing .

Nice and clean hotel and very strategic place , near from the airport and kuta beach . Breakfast nice , and friendly staff and overall okay . Hopefully june till july 2017 please make promo discount .

Nice sports bar atmosphere . Food service was exceptionally slow took over an hour to receive an order of spring rolls . Beers and drinks were on the pricey side . Many other places offer better service and are well priced .

One of the best hotels in Bali for budget travellers . neat & well designed rooms , adequately furnished . good house keepings & clean , hygienic environment . Food is also good . breakfast buffet was wholesome . Didn ' t taste rest of the meals as many options are available . overall nice & good hotel to stay while on a shoe string budget .
Food was not great and cold . A la carte is same food as the buffet . I would skip this place for the food , view is nice and drinks are ok . In general over priced .
Big room , clean , air con perfect , service perfect , food great , mostly Indonesian no eggs Only bad thing was water pressure of yes it had a bath wowowowowo . Pool temp to high needs shade .

Good service good food . I stayed for 3 night at Alea hotel , staffs are friendly and helpful . The dinner in D ' bale restaurant was excellent also afternoon tea in pool was really great . No regret to choose this place .

I ' ve stayed about 1 week in this hotel for my previous academic trip . The room was clean and comfortable . Hotel staffs are friendly and shuttle service is accessible any time . Good place to stay when visiting Bali .

The hotel staff is polite and friendly . Strategic location as the hotel is near to the beach and at the back of hotel is a shopping mall with a supermarket and lots of food . However the hotel room is a bit old but everything is neat and clean . Recommended !

A wonderful hotel albeit a bit rustic on the amenities . It has an amazing view with some rooms having a view of Mount Batur . the staff was responsive and always pleasant and the food in the resteraunt was quite good with ample portions and a good selection . The Indonesian breakfast was very good !

Well , the bathroom smells of sewerage and there are faeces smeared on the wall in the hallway ( human or otherwise ) . Far better ( and cleaner ) hotels available at lower prices , especially if you catch a good deal . Was a mistake to stay here , it feels pretty gross .

Improved the cleanliness of the room , pool and public area . It ' s the first impression to the customer if coming to the Hotel . Mold at the corner of shower , toilet liitle bit dirty , pool seems no body care .

Very bad service . Room interior and amenities ( towel ) was not well maintained . Floor was greasy . The staff lack of hospitality . The positive point only on the Ac was cool enough and bed sheet was clean .
Rooms provided in basement very disapointing booked in offer with dinner at seven bar the food menu was fixed and that was really not good . breakfast was good . seven bar was also good .

very comfortable rooms . great service and the staff are very helpful . reasonable price and good for the value . they have two great long pool for the ones who love doing laps . the restaurant and lounge is nice for hanging out and having a few beers .

We stay for 4 nights , comparing with another hotels in Bali can select low price for double bed room , fast internet connection and plasma tv . Sun royal is new hotel , all communication lines , interior , decoration and furmiture has perfect quality requirements . But the same breakfast set and location is quite out of legian street and beach .

Not much good to report here other than the location next to Discovery . Rooms are small Lots of broken and poorly maintained fixtures No fridge No staff at pool or pool bar abandoned Minimal amenities Terrible breakfast quality Beds and pillows so uncomfortable This one is only popular based on price for domestik visitors . Best avoided and try on of the newer choices nearby .

The guy on the reception was very helpful . The rooms were clean . The breakfast buffet was very good for Asia . So it was a nice time . Only thing we didn ' t like seminyak because it ' s too busy . One negative point the minibar wouldn ' t be filled again .
It was clean and great . . . supposed to have hot water but not on the night that I stayed : ( Pool is cool and near everything .
The room is quite old and there are mosquitoes at nite . The room is big though .

When the first time go inside to my room , thare is somebody was stting in my room ' s backyard . Because all the backyard are connecting its other . There is some noise near my room , maybe from generator that run full day . It ' s very disturbing . . . . Restaurant didn ' t comfort for breakfast , because sunshine goes inside restaurant . Location near airport .

Friendly staff , clean rooms . Room service is done every day . The pool is nice , although the smell of burning trash from the neighborhood ruined the fun quite many times . A common problem is Bali unfortunately .

This hotel is good price for money but you can find better in the same area . It ' s quite hard to find an hotel just with the description but when I saw the photo of the pool it seems to be nice , in fact there is about no place around and it ' s surrounded by wall , so no way to spend your afternoon in the pool .

Very quite , great hotel so homey every room have balcony and have a big room and bathroom also . There is swimming pool n billiard , restaurant n mini bar . I stayed for 2nights but got room in the back yard so Internet for wifi not so good .

We stayed only one night as it was too noisy ( too close from the road and no possibility to close the window correctly / fully . And the bed was not confortable . The staff of the hotel were very nice with us . Great team !

The hotel provided a great view of Mt Batur and Lake Batur . The room was clean and comfortable . The service was okay , and the only place in Bali where we did not get special personalized service . The restaurant did not have much vegetarian variety . It was good for the price , but perhaps Bali spoiled us with better service .

The room was great , spacious completed with the balcony , but unfortunately the room was not really clean ( dust at my bed sheet , stain at water heater , and found deadly cockroaches ) . The housekeeping should be more details when checking the room cleanliness .

I stayed at Vilarsi for three nights and I got bitten badly by bed bugs . My whole arm was swollen . They wouldn ' t give me refund either . The AC didn't work so it was very warm at bedtime . Do not recommend !

Absolutely loved my stay and plan to stay again when I make the trip to kuta . Staff are friendly hotel fabulous total 5 stars from me . Everything is close by that I need eg restaurant , shops , cinema , laundry , markets , convenient store , and the beach plus airport .

It was a three night stay at Mercure Harvestland , joining workshop on 16 - 19 Nov . 2015 . I stay at room # 338 . Although the hotel is city hotel , but offer good services , clean room , simple but nice meeting hall . Indonesian food served was tasty . Recommended for those who are looking for city hotel !

Everything is fine . . My only concern only with the AC since 3 of 7 rooms that I booked has a decent cool . . They also need to pay attention about the dust in the floor of Street view balcony room . . The service is excellent and i will definitely back and recommend this hotel to my other friends . .

We were so happy with the wonderful staff , clean and modern rooms and the kids had hours of fun in the pool . There were a couple of cockroaches running around in the bedroom but i am sure most place would have that problem .

Staff were excellent . Ricky on the front desk was outstanding and so was a lovely girl named Ayu who worked in the restaurant and on the breakfast bar . Self serve Breakfast was very ordinary and the Hotel smells musty and is always dark . It is along way to the centre of Kuta . I would not stay again or recommend it to others .

water at bathrooms is kinda salty so you may feel disgusted while showering or cleaning your mouth . but i think every hotel near seaside like that cuz all of them purify sea . hotel stuffs are helpful and sincere . breakfasts may be better but still good .

Recommended hotel , near seminyak to bar club and beach . Enjoying stay here . Staff very friendly , cleaners hotel , price not expensive . Breakfast variant is good , but pool area is small . Thanks to all staff here .

Great value hotel , its not to expensive and comfortable to take a rest n holiday . The room is also clean Location is closed to the kuta beach and another entertainment So . . . what are u waiting guys . . .

We booked the Family Villa and the upstairs room was very spacious . Downstairs you had your own courtyard which included a fish pond . The swimming pool was fantastic so at 8am we went in , but there were no towels until 9am so see if you can get some towels the night before if you plan on swimming in the morning .

Hotel staff are a friendly , always smiling and very helpful . location of hotel is good . everything is within walking distance . price is reasonable so don ' t expect room and hotel facilities to be 5 star . dining at hotel nothing much to shout about . overall , value for money .

We had an amazing stay at le grande ! Nice location a bit outside the centre of uluwatu - easy to get around with scooters you can rent at the hotel . Very friendly and service - minded staff , beautiful atmosphere , good drinks and great breakfast !
The room was very small but adequate and beds were very comfortable with nice linen . Downsides were poor breakfasts and meals in general and crappy stained towels .

Great hotel and a wonderful location . The rooms are well maintained . Great staff and the service was excellent . I really enjoyed the amazing pool . Had a good time during my stay at Le Grande Bali , definitely worth a second visit !

Room size was very small . And the bathroom very terrible smell . . for the wifi range quality was good enough for business . BUT everything not god in the morning for asking me to Q at the egg station at breakfast not polite service from the cooker .

I like to stay at this hotel again , service is excellent and the Manager Pak Didi is very Kindfull and responsible . This hotel location is good . My family enjoy the room have garden and near pool at the roof .

The room is old and the toilet is extremely noisy due to the generator of the water heater . We have to shut it off to have a good sleep . Is way to noisy , but the noice from other rooms still haunting us . The air - condition of our room barely working . We have to call for the staff for twice to get this fit .

NIce hotel with friendly staff . Breakfast was excellent with good variety of food . The only thing that needs attention is the quality of towels provided in the bath room . They were worn out and not in good condition anymore .

Stayed for 1 month in a 1 bedroom apartment . Value for money definitely ! Has cooking facilities and a great pool area . The apartments are split level so give that spacious feeling . Breakfast could cater more towards westerners we chose to cook our own or eat out most mornings . Hire a motorbike and your in seminyak within 10 minutes .
