Spend 2 nights during family vacation and it was really an enjoyable stay . All staff were extremely helpful and they always greet us with the warm smile , the location very strategic and very closed to discovery mall . Once again thank you for the hospitality .

we have been here for couple of days , we chosen this hotel because the location is very strategic . many things should be improved of this hotel such as elevator , wifi , and the water heater , but for the rest was nice and the service was great .
The room is so small , but it had a strategic location , just 5 - 10 minutes to Legian . 15 minutes to Kuta . The bed too close to bathroom .

The Hotel location is very good that the reasons I choice fame hotel but the room was smiling a person who are stay there before me . Need more detail attention from the room division and double check and do not relay on the steward .

I stayed 3 days 2 nights , the hotel was very comfortable , clean , the employees are friendly and always smiling , close to the city center and many cafes and restaurants around . Very impressive and to meet again in the coming holidays .

I come short with my friend at room 223 , nice double bedroom , modern design , This hotel very recommended for backpackers , values of money , hospitality staff with greeting & smile to all the guest , I ' m sure will comeback for next trip .

I put it as title because this fact is iritating for me & my friend . Other than that , this hotel is clean enough . Good service and good breakfast . The best of it is good location . It ' s in front of Kuta beach , two 24hours fast food restaurants and minimarkets .

+ ve Nice large room with a great view of the ocean . Wonderful view of the night sky from the rooftop pool . - ve No room service until 11am . Food from hotel restaurant is cold and in many cases tasteless . Our email got hacked on their wifi within 20mins of connecting .
Rooms are a bit dirty but great location if you want to be right in Kuta , Pool is good quality . Service is as expected .

I think this hotel is worth for short stay as it near Kuta beach , Beachwalk shopping centre and Ngurah Rai Airport . Easy access to Kuta area too . I love the pool much . It ' s not Olympic size , but you can give a couple of swimming in the pool .

1 jan 2015 , I just check out and forgot my wa tch left in the rooms in two day I call to the recipient tell her that i left my watch in the room even since now they didn ' t even respon me if they have find it or not . .
This hotel is located at the heart of Denpasar . Very close to the DFS Maal , Where you can shop duty free products . Restaurant offers decent menu . Rooms are spacious with all modern amenities .
ROOM ADEQUATE - - NO FRIDGE AS WAS SUPPOSED TO BE - - BREAKFAST VERY ORDINARY AND NO MILK AVAILABLE ON SUNDAY MORNING ! ! FOR THE PRICE ONE CANT EXPECT TOO MUCH MORE .

Clean and average hotel . Segara beach located about 200 metres from hotel . Nice friendly staff , need to deposit IDR 50K to have spare room key . They don ' t have various breakfast . Small room and there ' re no balcony . They have glass outdoor pool . Many small restaurant and store around the hotel .

We stayed here for 5 days , and what made me happy was " Baby friendly ' . Our daughter could walk around the garden rich in nature and enjoy swimming in the pool , and moreover they cooked special meal for her , especially Ms . Yuni who was at the restaurant kindly accepted our request , who also played with her , thank you !

Many people have written about a lot of bad things about this hotel but I think me and my wife top it all . We had SUAGE WATER from the shower . . . . The hotel also have a strange feeling . Like one breakfast for the chinese and one international . If you have booked this hotel DONT eat at the hotel , terrible .
very nice , cozy , bed was very comfy . unfortunately they dont have smoking room and balcony , but they have an amazing view at the rooftop . . all staff are very helpful and friendly .

Great Hotel , I like the view , clean room , great service . But the bathroom lil bit leaked . Overall i like to stay there . I will back for sure there if i have any schedule in Singaraja . The location also strategist for any food court .

low budget hotel with perfect location . This hotel doesnt have room with balcony or window but it ' s worth because they located in front of Kuta beach , surrounded by restaurants and 24 hour mini market .

Stayed here due of the Location , right next to Beachwalk and many other shops . A 5 mins bike ride to Legian for nightlife , shopping and massage . Breakfast buffet was average , internet connection was alright though .

Over all satisfied , room is clean and tidy . Front desk is a bit disorganized , rest every thing is fine . Well come drink was poor . Breakfast and Dinner was fine . Roof top pool was nice , though it was a bit small . Family friendly . Cordial staff . Good one .

Location of the hotel is the best because its near to the market and 10 mins walk - in from the hotel , also you can find lots of disco , spa , restaurant , money changer , information center for tourist and small shops for tattoo , cloths etc .

I ' ve been to this place twice since last year . The hotel staffs are friendly and provide a very good services for budget hotel . The room is clean and comfortable . The only downside is the hotel location is a lil bit walking distance from main road but still managable .

Even tough on the main page on TripAdvisor it is featured with free breakfast you have to pay 100000 IDR extra for breakfast . So take care on the details of your booking . The rooms are nice and clean and it ' only 700m from denpasar airport .

I do not usually write reviews , though do use the reviews of others on trip advisor to guide me on hotels . I am extremely disappointed with this hotel which ranks surprisingly highly , and would strongly advise others to reconsider before booking this . The good - Clean , good breakfast , powerful shower The bad - Poor service , poor service , poor service .
Very nice concept hotel , minimalis and cheaper . With the good location in seminyak street , close to go every where . The staff was polite and helpfull . Very Enjoy to stay in this hotel .

we stayed here again as the location is right in the heart of Kuta . very convenient to get food , to shop , and access to the beach . thank you Pak Edo , the manager , for the hospitality during our stay . appreciate the upgrades and all the personal services you provided especially for us .

Located in nice location . The cleaning service schedule should be in earlier time ( during morning ) . The taste of food is acceptable with limited variety . The room is not really kids friendly ( under 3 years ) .

I check in really late time . but very feel comportable and it is really good location . very close to Airport and Kuta area . I got really good price . Guest service and room condition also exellent . I will stay if I will be Bali again . They gave me Airport pick up service , it was almost 3 am . with a cheap price .

Only stayed for one night but Spacious and clean room . Airconditioning worked well and nice to have hot water . Swimming pool looked nice unfortunately did not get a chance to go in it . Only problem was not many plug sockets available . Located near lots of restaurants and bars . But peaceful and quiet in the hotel . Has a TV as well .

Quite small room but very clean . Staffs are extremely friendly and helpful . But the location is a bit far from tourists attraction . No problem to go to Kuta by cab , but the problem was on the way back to the hotel , the traffic was terrible . Overall , its a good hotel with great staffs .
The room is a little too small , but room is quite clean . Another drawback is the mini pool . The " swimming pool " is really too small for an adult to swim .

Good location for surfing Kuta reef . Friendly staff decent but small room . Good wifi . Didnt like the menu but a few doors down towards beach was a great place to eat . Didn ' t like the fishbowl pool . Was a little bit noisy at times . Would happily return .

We dined at the Bali Summer Restaurant . There are so many great eating places in Bali , but this is not one of them . The food was terrible , the beans were off and the meal was cold . Food and prices are much better at a local warung .

labels.opinion: much better at a local warung
much better at a local warung

category.text: Stayed here twice now Cheap simple accommodation , nice pool and close to everything , the establishment is always clean and the staff are friendly . You can barley hear the street outside which is a nice change from the hustle and bustle that is the Bali tourist areas , Will keep coming back .

Location is good . Conveniently located near beach and all the tourist requirements . Staff are supportive and helpful . Room is clean but little outdated . Bathroom shower does not drain . Breakfast spread is adequate . Roof top pool and restaurant is nice .

I ' m happy to stay at Fave Hotel Kartika Plaza . My experience here was good . The hotel is clean , good location , nice roof top swimming pool area , staffs are friendly , location is quite strategic , comfortable . Thanks !

Thanks to Spazzio Bali Hotel They give a small surprise to my girlfriend birthday . A small chocolatte cake and candle light its to ammazing . maybe their receptionist looking from out passport so they know her birthday . Everything good in the room , bfast , service . Thankyou so muuuuuchhh . .

Nice week staying here . Wasn ' t sure about the location at first but it turned out to be great and only a idr30k taxi ride to Seminyak sq . it was a really peaceful place with friendly staff . Only thing missing was kitchen utencils .

All room comes with en - suite bath tub . Golf view room , good hot water pressure , aircon is up to satisfaction . Room is so much spacious , good lighting . Satisfactory dining experience . Suggestion is only to manage loud neighboring guests with kids on resting hours .

This looks like an amazing hotel at first glance . A beautiful lobby and roof top pool with a bar . But the rooms are barely sufficient , the bar tender was clueless and the place just had a smell of sewage . The room we stayed in had a very dodgy balcony that faced the main road .

Very nice hotel with friendly staffs . Location is near to airport , mall , and some shopping area . Food also good . Room facility and amenities are also nice . Bathroom quite outdated and no hair dryer , you need to request to reception on hair dryer where staff will deliver it to your room .

In the middle of it . . but on the rooftop you can escape it - best of both ! Rooms were good and quiet considering location , which is a plus ! Bar and food is reasonably priced . Rooftop pool is lovely .

Cheap hotels with the best quality to please themselves enjoy the breadth of rooms , take a warm bath and get a good night ' s sleep , after that you can enjoy a trip to the area of ​ ​ souvenirs that are not far away , enjoy typical food , and twilight on Kuta beach .

Great location in Legian close to many restaurants and shops . Very cheerful staff . Breakfast was bleak but Coffee Corner was nearby and was my daily go to . Cleaning was a bit hit and miss and the bathroom could have done with a deep clean . Acceptable at the price and if visiting Bali again , I would consider it .

labels.opinion: could have done with a deep clean

category.text: Everything there looks brand new , rooms , swimming pool , restaurant , etc , the location it is a little bit crazy , it is on the main road , if you need to cross the road . oooooo forget it , gonna take hours to do it safety , but they have daily free shuttle bus to KUTA center , easy to do shopping .

I hope your staf have better manner Knock the door before enter the room Don ' t blame the hotel system ( the computer ) for their silly mistake I won ' t stay at this hotel anymore Aston hotel standard shouldn ' t be this way . .

I have stayed here for a day . The hotel is located very near to Kuta beach and also has a nice pool in the midst . I didn ' t find the staffs very helpful but keeping in mind the price I paid , it is worth staying for .

Avoid this place like the plague it is filthy the sheets where stained the pillows had mould on them the towels where grey and stained the balcony door was incredibly hard to lock the balcony was covered in rat droppings i was supposed to stay for 5 nights only stayed 1 and i only stayed that night because i had arrived VERY late .

We were on the trip from Jakarta to Labunbajo and in order to arrive at Labuanbajo in the morning we had to stay in Denpasar . The hotel is small but nice and comfort . Close to airport , only less than 10 minutes by car . We stayed at the family room that actually two rooms connected . We had a comfort sleep . The hotel also value for money .

Nice hotel for low budget . Good location ( 10 min walk to main area ) . Rooms are basic but clean . Comfortable beds . Wifi was strong . Pools nice , it stays open till 11pm which is brilliant . Breakfast was nice but could do with a bit more variety . Staff were very nice and helpful .

My place @ room 5 only 2 room we are family 2 room and nothing people again so scary , so lonely , and i got small room but that price more expensive than other hotel look like losari , dont have hairdryer , dont have anything toothbrush , uncomplete facility hmm and i dont like breakfast yuck . .

Friendly service , can leave a suitcase bag while waiting for the departure of the plane at night . The rooms are very comfortable , there is a door to connect between family rooms . Overall I was satisfied , further enhanced the quality !

It was a great experience , staff are friendly and cooperative , the location was perfect and the hotel arranged free ride to many beautiful places around and with other places , using Grab was very affordable and simple . If I will come back to Uluwatu , I will stay in Le Grande for sure .

Location so strategic and easy to find . Parking area quite big . Variety menu of breakfast . Room is clean but in the night some mosquito disturb our sleep . Price quite cheap because i bought voucher from groupon .

The hotels was in the middle commercials areas with many empty spaces . Conditions of the surrounding area is not so pleasantly clean and way out from Kuta Beach and Jalan Legian where you can find many restaurants and cafes . So better look somewhere else for your comfort and time saving . I would definitely not recommended this hotel . The plus point is , the staffs are really helpful .

The hotel have big room with big TV screen . The bathroom complete with bathtub and shower room , plus 2 hand washing facilities . Breakfast taste is standard , but you can free request some slice of grill pork . Need little bit effort to the dreamland beach thru klapa beach club by free . The beach club have a amazing view , if you want to swim just pay Rp 40 .

Great location and friendly staff . . room clean but no soap shampoo toothpaste tissues etc . . so close to markets and beachwalk shopping center with big supermarket . . a few minutes and you are at the beach . . .

If you looking just for clean place to sleep this hotel will server you need . Clean room , new hotel located on major street . If front office staff will be more prompt in recognizing guest arrival the service this would be great hotel . Room key are lock on 2nd day stay . I have not try the breakfast , concierge staff very helpful . Overall stay are ok .

Excellent room and worth it . I choose pool access room . My favourite is Alea Hotel is quite and strategic location . Thank you for the hospitality by the way . I enjoyed every moment at Alea Hotel Seminyak .

Location is very good . Not far to go to tourist spots or airport , but you must have transportation ( rental car or taxi ) as the hotel is right on the big road . Was there for one night and was a nice stay . The pool on the roof top is very nice , good spot to hangout .
The room so bad . . . many small animal inside bed . . . please if you want sale your room must be clean . . . May be prices cheap but no reason with room . . .

I got confuse when going to amaris hotel because the road is rounded and at first i couldn ' t find the hotel . After i came , the room is nice and the location is good because it ' s near the nightlife in bali . there are some minimarkets around the hotel and there is a shortcut to go to the beach .

Beatifull place , good prices for what they offer for but they dont speak english at all . They wont be bottering al the time to sell tours or trying to make money from you . We rented a motorbike and it was perfect , we didnt have any problem at all .

Not so close to city center but you can stay in a quiet zone , 10 min walking from city center . Good rooms and good service . Great price and good amenities . Didnt try the restaurant but it looks nice . We stay for two nights and the first day was less expensive than the 2nd night because we make the reservation online . .

Stayed at this hotel for a week , was the worse hotel ive ever stayed at . The room was small , nothing in the mini bar , half the lights didnt work and to top it all off , i had my keycard stolen out of my room . Do not stay here at all .

Dirty and smelly . Mouldy smell in the room . Food from previous night was still left in the hallway for the whole time we were there ( 12 hours ) . Was forced to stay her due to flight cancellation , would never recommend this Hotel to anyone .
Stayed at this hotel for 4 nights . good location . walking distance to kuta beach and surroundings . A clean and comfortable hotel with a pool . the staff are nice .

I like this hotel , it is clean , comfortable , near Kuta , and cheap as well . Last time i paid IDR 550 but it does not include breakfast . I think the pool is too small . The bar closed at 11pm The service also really great , really friendly and helpful . Definately will come again !

Stayed here for about a week - - great location , within walking distance of the small gang way ( alley ) that goes directly to Double Six Beach . There were some issues with my booking and wanting to extend , but it worked out in the end ( after a discussion with several staff members ) . The room was basic and clean - - bathroom was modern .
The place is nice , clean , the reception was friendly and fast . There was a pool on top floor , comfortable to use the facility . Great place , recommend if you want to stay in Legian area .

Room was clean and services was good too . Clean and compact swimming pool . Located nearby many restaurants . Lighting in the room was not enough as they were a bit dark inside the room . The water from shower was ok .

I just had a lovely relaxing night here . My room on the first floor was quiet and comfortable . Breakfast was good and staff was very friendly and helpful . Daniel at reception went out of his way to make me feel comfortable . After thirty - six hours of travel this was a welcome relaxation . The pool was clean too .

This is actually my 3rd times came to this hotel . The reason why i came to this hotel more than once , just because the staff are really friendly and extremly helpful . The room is so good and clean as well . Thank you !

Stayed here 4 nights . Staff friendly and organised . Rooms cleaned well . Komang is very friendly and she can sort out anything you need during your stay . Only downside of hotel is Satellite TV only has 1 channel and no free WiFi . With good location it ' s better to look outside anyhow .

The hotel is clean . The staff is friendly . Quiet environment , so I was able to sleep well . The location is fantastic . The breakfast is too simple , will be nice if more fruits are provided . Thank You ! !

I love the ambience and solemnity of the area , though kinda bit old place but the value for money is still worth it . Seminyak is not too crowded unlike in the busy streets of ubud district . Great stay with very accomodating staffs .

our first time staying here . nice hotel , the room was huge and clean . the staff are friendly and helpfull . they provide parking area across the street . this hotel located close to Lippo mall Kuta , and about 10mnts to kuta beach by car . they give us free late c / o until 1PM .

it ' s located in front of kuta beach . Great location . Near hard rock cafe and beachwalk . Comfort and clean room . But its food is lil bit dissapointed . buffet of indonesian food but has less taste .

Thank you everyone for your great service and hospitality . Nice swimmingpool and breakfast is included in the rate . Alltough it is located in Legian it is still peacfull and quiet during the night . Hope to have the chance to come back to this place .
Found a great price on agoda and that made this such a good deal . Staff were friendly , food was good . Room was huge and very well furnished . Pool was really nice and location was good .
If you are not picky when it cones to accomodation and like to meet new people and party , this is the perfect place . I always stay here when i come to Kuta and always have a blast .

Got room for 6 nights for $ 300 Oz with b / fast . Had upstairs room over looking pool . Had all the basics and was real value for money . Will definetly come back here . UPSIDE : : : value , friendly staff , location .

Stayed here on my last night in Bali and it was great . The location is a great place to use to get in and out of Kuta . Traffic can be a pain sometimes but make sure you rent a motorbike for transportation . The hotel itself is very nice and clean and I always love the open - air lobbies .

Everything was fine . Clean room , friendly staffs , good location , good service . My friend forgot her wallet in room , the stiffs kept for her , really appreciated ! The food in the restaurant was good with good price . Recommend for the stay ! ! !

The location was good , it is close to Lippo Mall Kuta and not really far from Kuta Beach ( within walking distance ) . This hotel is value for money and I got a great experience while staying here . Thank you !

Hotel was near to airport about 7 minute driving , opposite hotel have a mart is convenient . And around the hotel within walking distance u can have local food and many restaurant . Room is huge however will be great if the lightning is strong , too dark . Swimming pool was great .

Palm Beach Hotel has a convenient location at about 2 kilometers from Bali International airport and a walking distance from Kuta beaches and busy life and activities . The hotel has a nice swimming pool and you can take a simple buffet breakfast there for around US $ 5 . The weak point is the wifi that seems quite chaotic . It often stops totally at night time and from occasionally during the day .

Nothing special . Water was yellowish Floor in room was broken . Garden was not Well - maintained Children ' s play ground was not managed . Breakfast was just average The good thing was the bellboy was willing to help and friendly .

Its nearly from Airport also shopping mall , can find anything surround the hotel , take include airport transfer with hotel car and driver , everything running well as expected . Check in fast , helpful staff and nice breakfast . Get back here for the next trip .

Nice homestay with a pool , but the room had a very weird smell . Also there was a light shining through our window all night long so it was bit difficult to sleep . Breakfast is included and was very nice . No airconditioning in the room , but the fan does quite the job . Also wifi is not available at all times .

Check in was efficient , comfort and clean room , welcoming staffs . Location is very strategic : close and in walking range to many interesting areas around Legian and Seminyak . Foods were ok , but the coffee machine was disappointed .

A very good economy budget hotel our room was a little run down but everything was clean and in working order Good value for money the hotel is is very convenient to Kuta Square and shopping . The restaurant is good the food is cheap . Will stay there again .

Had a wonderful time at Dekuta hotel . Very close to Beachwalk shopping centre and the beach . Staff at the hotel looked after us extremely well and with courtesy , especially the reception staff and our housekeeper Kadek Suarsana . He went out of his way to help make our holiday as relaxing as possible - even when he was off duty .

Well priced 3 Star hotel that is idealy located near Legian St , the beach and Kuta square for great shopping . The hotel has a good resturant that is well priced . Some staff do not speak english fluently but usually you can get yourself understood .

100 % will be back again . Loved it because near mall and kuta beach . Breakfast was bored if you stayed more than 3 days , need more variety of the menu . But overall . . . spacious room , friendly staff . . . satisfied hotel .

I stayed at the hotel on 20th of August 2016 , on my anniversary . The hotel helped me so much on preparing the surprise in the room . The Front Desk staff was also very professional and very welcomed . Much smiles . Love it .

The hotels is nice with black and white ambience . Staff is friendly . Location is near with lippo mall and near with airport . Clean rooms , ac is working but they only give one slippers . Clean toilet and full amenities . Minus : far from beach and there ' s mosquito in my rooms . Its really annoying , i cant sleep ! ! !

Small , plain and efficient ( somewhat devoid of character ) . A typical business hotel . We think our room was swiped with salt water as the floor was sticky . The breakfast is complete and quite good . Strategic location if you want to explore Legian . A safe ( but mediocre ) option for anyone looking for budget practical accomodation .

wife and i had a very nice stay here . nothing flash and could do with a bit of spit and polish but all very clean good staff and in a good position . breakfast was ordinary but there was an egg corner . small but good pool and we had it to ourselves most of the 10 days we were here .

I think this is even worse than a Budget Hotel qualifications . . I got a room on 3rd floor and surprised there was no Lift / Elevator , the shower only small drops of water and hot water not working . Breakfast also very poor only 2 - 3 choices . . so I considered this is a Motel .

The service is partly not friendly and not helpful . We needed help in one case or another and unfortunately we were on our own . Also , the place was relatively far away from the center . However , we were the apologetic .

Staff needs more training about the hotel product knowledge and also customer service . Breakfast venue for the groups could be nice separate venue from the normal guests who pay the room rate more than Need more hotel direction for room allocation and facilities .

We stayed in one Bed Room SUITE 28th to 30th Dec 2016 , luxury hotel and still new , very quiet location , near to Dreamland beach with free shuttle bus but pick up time back to the hotel is not sharp ( late 20 minutes ) .

3rd Time Stay At This Hotel , Room Are Clean & Spotless , Comfortable Bed , Accor Hotels Platinum Benefit Generously Granted ! Definately Exceed The Value Paid . Will Be Back Again Soon . Anyway Breakfast Experience Can Be Better .

Stayed for a conference . Good facilities for that . Staff very hard to understand . On main Road nowhere near the tourist part of Bali . Has a wonderful day spa . Good choice on breakfast buffet which is located on the roof where 1 of the pools are .

Great expieriance here . . so cheap and worth it . . those complaining of noise and room amenities etc are ridiculous . . what do you expect paying $ 50 a night ! ! ! ! ! staff friendly and helpful . . breakfast could be improved but wasnt expecting much to begin with with a room so cheap !

Had an amazing stay and great time at its D'Bar with tenders Krishna , Dharma and Deva . In love with Krishna's exclusive ‘ Chocklate Whiskey Shower'🍹 Actually thers no need to go out of this place ; Its all in 1 .
The hotel is a budget Balinese Style Hotel the staff are very welcoming , willing to assist and go the extra mile to assist in any and every way .

I was recommended by my driver in Bali to stay at this hotel , this is kind of old hotel , the price is okay , but do not have enough option of TV channel , the shower flow is very slow especially the cool water and the others guest is very noisy .

The reception was not friendly at all . It seemed a security man , untrained welcoming guests . The room was clean but the bathroom door was chipped . No toothbrush n the towels had stained all over n the color was not white anymore . A hotel with the price of 60USD n more should have been better in hospitality , including caring for the towels . OMG !
I was stay there for two night last month , room very nice , staff are freinldy , breakfast is good , but internet connection ( wifi ) bad connection in the room and lobby also restaurant area .

It ' s a beautiful hotel to stay at . Traditionally done . I did not want to stay at any normal hotel , rather wanted to experience something different . We had an open air bathroom , was the first time I experienced it . Was a lil a weird since we friends stayed along . A comfy stay .

It was nice to stay here in # 310 for short trip in Bali . Stay with the ' Hollywood Stars ' , clean room and great balcony to view the busy street . Relax at the pool by the evening before 8 pm , and got free pop corn for me . The breakfast was good . Many variation on it . Will back for another short trip here . Cheers !

Very nicely located next to the beach . A little noise from nearby Finn ' s during daytime . Good for surfers . staff very friendly . rooms of OK standard . good massage , nice breakfast - buffet . good overall service .
Staffs are nice and friendly , room is clean , everything works . Pool is nice but very small . Breakfast is eddible but not delicious / tasteful .

The hotel is relatively new . Rooms are nicely decorated with safety locker in each room . Buffet breakfast is brilliant with variety of choices . Have a swimming pool and gym . But location is not very good far away from beach .

The staffs are friendly , the room is clean , but breakfast menu need more variations . The location is very strategic , there ' s McD , Starbucks , Dim Sum , Sushi Tei and many others restaurants nearby .

This hotel is tucked away in a small street off the main road . The taxi might have problems locating this place . The entire vicinity is reasonably clean and cozy with 2 long pools right in the middle . Room is quite small but enough for a good night sleep . Basic accommodation and nothing to shout about . Staff members are friendly .

Transit from Timor to Perth W . Australia 1 day & night . Very friendly staff helpful and welcoming . Rooms were great , Location of hotel was awesome close to 2 major shopping centres lippo mall and Centro . Close to airport . Love staying in Tuban area , FAV HOTEL was affordable and very clean . . definitely will return . Thankyou to FAV staff . . very professional .

a value for money stay near hustle and bustle of Kuta . stayed here for 1 night . the bed was comfortable . check in process was fast and smooth . the rooms were very large , but there were patches in corners and some broken furniture . the bathroom was clean and toiletries were provided . all in all for Rs 1700 / - it was pretty value for money .

Lots of noise especially corridor area . Cannot sleep properly and lots of toilet flies . Spring beds are in total bad shape and pillow all in bat condition . Hotel needs an upgrade . Foul smell from WC and cigarettes smell all over the room .

Its a nice located hotel yet very quiet that you can rest nicely . The room is small , but I think it is fine . My favourite place is the rooftop swimming pool , especially near sunset time . Wifi works well .

Stayed two night at Tusita . Reasonable prices , free breakfast . Loved how we stepped outta the hotel and straight on the streets of Kuta . Shops within walking distance . Close to everything . Shop and spa straight across the road . Awesome to stay fr a few nights .

Booked my son in here as a last minute thing . Really only needed the room to sleep in as he was spending most of the time at our hotel down the street . It is close to everything and convenient to bars and shops . Good value for $ 30A a night which included breakfast !

Great cheap accommodation - friendly staff - rooms clean and tidy - central to everything yet quiet . No kettle but easy to ring room service for tea / coffee and food etc Only negative was staff talking in the morning outside of rooms but wasn ' t ridiculously early .

Close to the beach and shopping malls . Nice pool . Rooms are big . Bathroom is a bit peculiar as it is made by glass walls so you can peak in from the bedroom . Might be a thing to consider if your companion isn ' t that close .
We came to enjoy the honeymoon in kuta area its very strategic location near the airport and the shopping center .

A modern and nice hotel , located in the heart of agitated Kuta . The room was nice and neat , but had a huge and insistent tabaco smell . The Room was on the ground floor , therefore ir was a little bit noisy .

We stayed there from 18 / 10 / 2014 - 20 / 10 / 2014 . Hotel quite hidden . It will be much better if there ' s elevator for those travel with big luggage . After all the shopping , we struggled with our luggage to check out . Water boiler need to be request . The toilet sewage smells after we flushed . There ' s no basic toiletries in the toilet .

We stay there last year very good hotel value for the money we paid . parking space little bit not enough . but all theother things are very good . we enjoyed really well . roof top swimming pool there .

I wandered into this hotel for lunch and I was greeted by green lawns with guests relaxing by the pool , under tall trees , or sitting at / on the white furnishings with the amazing blue surf crashing in front of me . Such a beautiful scene . The food and service was quite good too .

I ' m not staying here but popped in for a beer , good friendly bar , nice open plan area , live music , I ' m disappointed by the service . . There was only half a dozen guests left in the bar and the waitress was supposed to let me know when the kitchen closed but didnt . . . So I ' m tired and hungry . .

Stunning views and they have overly friendly staff . Amenities are well kept . The food is delicious too , prices are a bit higher though . It was really a nice place to relax , swimming and enjoying our day . Sunsets are a next level .

The hotel location is good as it is near to restaurants and clubs . Hiring a car is cheap and you can get assistance from the Front Desk for this . Breakfast is adequate . All the staffs are so helpful and friendly . We enjoyed our holiday in Bali . This hotel is value for money !

We book the basic room : no hot water ( not a problem ) no air conditioning , only fan . . . . but we can ' t change the speed , finally , it was too hot ! so we decide to upgrade . . . air conditioning , hot wather and bath . . .

Highly recommend this hotel ! ! Rooms were fully cleaned everyday , big buffet breakfast every morning , has a kids playground and a spa where you can get massages , pedicures etc . staff were lovely always and so polite . Had free Shuttle buses everyday running to kuta beach , discovery shopping mall . Great high speed Internet .

this hotel location consider strategy as it was situated not very far from kuta beach . taking a taxi to kuta beach will cost you less than 30k rupiah . Hotel surrounding have a lot of eateries and convenient shop . Value for money stay !

We stayed here for 4 nights and the hotel was great . Rooms were very clean and hotel staff was very friendly . It is very near to airport ( 10 - 15 mins ) and kuta area . Lounge and restaurant is also good . Lots of variety . We really enjoyed our stay .

We are enjoying our stay very much . BBQ Night on Friday nights is good - all you can eat . Had a lovely massage . I cannot speak highly enough of the staff . Everyone is so very friendly and they can ' t do enough for you to make sure your time with them is both relaxing and enjoyable .

I would say it looks a bit somber inside the hotel , give the hallway and the rooms a bit of a color , also the bathroom is a bit outdatet and small . for the rest the breakfast is very good and also the rooms are very clean . Same as the personal they are always helpfull and friendly . I was surprised you cannot make international calls from the hotel .

service is good , they serve only breakfast , no other food served . But fortunately they have a restaurant area just opposite to the property where we can find a lot of options . Breakfast is nice . . decent . . .

Good service , friendly , delicious food , clean rooms , very good acces , great view , my family really enjoyed staying at favehotel kuta kartika plaza and would come back if visiting denpasar bali .

The room was clean and breakfast was good too , but when it was heavy rain , the outside passage was flooded . And we had to go through that way , so it was only uncomfortable matter for me . If it is improved , I wanna use this hotel again ! !

What a great Place . The pool is small but worth swimming in . We had breakfast on our first morning . It was good . Had to use our hotel room towel for when we went to the pool . The poolside bar hadnt been operating for what looked like years . Yet the hotel caters for 54 rooms . Which makes it more intimate .

We did stay in the hotel Solaris and it is a very good hotel the rooms are very nice and the staff is great , we wanted to thank Ayu and Yande and Special thanks for Kerni because she did help us with solving problems with the flight company Citilink . We will go back to Solaris !

Visited the restaurant - awful ! Starter arrived cold - sent back . Mains arrived so awful two of us didn ' t eat it the third tried a little and regretted it . Had a quick glance in the kitchen in leaving , wish I had on arrival . Do not eat here !

Great value . Upside : Room was dark , beds are very comfortable with quality sheets , modern style , good bathroom , quiet room , good aircon , no smell in room and the best massage place next to hotel called body fit . Downside : got to catch a cab every where , no pool and restaurant is not worth going to .

I just spend my honey moon there at 17 may , best view for honeymoon . . . The lack is , the water hitter not work well in the morning , hot water is not serve if we not asking , for breakfast I have no comment , very ordinary . They just have wonderful view , and great wave .

The hotel was perfect for us a couple traveling to Bali for the first time and we will stay there again . The pool was lovely , the breakfast was simple but perfect to start the day . My husband and I enjoyed our stay . Very close to food , stalls and transport was always very easy to access .

Two lap pools . Deluxe room comfortable , serviced daily by wonderful staff . Two free water daily . In room tea & coffee supplied . The Spa too expensive , good decor . Ade the restaurant manager was very helpful , his staff are respectful towards Ade and all tourists . Buffet breakfast , freshly made eggs served any way you like .

I have lost my money 100 $ when i go to the outside activities . I want to remined you all please be carefull housekeeper . So i complain to hotel manager but they don ' t take any action to the thief . So i really recommand you should be careful housekeeper .

Photos do not do this place justice , its beautiful . Staff great , really clean . Great pool , beautiful surroundings . 100 % recommended . Sunset from hotel gardens is out of this world ! Dolphin trip is a must ! !

Great location . too bad about all the noise due to thin walls and floors . cleaning is good but replacement of toilet paper , soap and tea bags not reliable . breakfast was adequate but the fact that scrambled eggs are available was not publicized . reception staff were polite and efficient .

If you don ' t mind walking 5 minutes to the heart of Seminyak this is the place . Rooms clean , however could use a paint job . Pool is excellent with bar and restaurant open all the time . We found that eating a drinking in the hotel was cheaper than some of the other places outside . Would definitely stay here again .

We were told that this is the best in Mt Batur region . Hotel room was clean and basic but we were disappointed with the weak lighting , poor water heating system , lack of tv network n weak wifi . Other than that , service was good n the staff tried to attend to all our requests .

Nice efficient and value for money , and also well located . . . It suit your active holiday trip in Bali , go out all day , and back to the room and go sleep . . . it's well located , lot's of bar and resto . Waterbom and discovery mall just 5 minute walk .

After having problems with the first hotel I went to Aqua Ozz and they were really good and found us a room so we could get out of the other hotel . The room was fine and cleaned everyday the service was good the only problem was the pool isn ' t deep enough but that didn ' t worry us . I enjoyed my stay and would stay there again .

When we checked in ( Rm 169 ) we are told that our room is WITHOUT BALCONY . We said OK ! When we got there the room is WITHOUT WINDOW ! ! ! ! . So we ' re a bit upset with that . They pretend they don ' t know the difference !
This hotel is just beside Legian Beach Hotel . Room is quite small but overall is nice and worth it . Just few minutes walk to the beach . A lot Japanese stay in this hotel .

Maintenance is not good , the showerdeain was clogged , i reported twice but nothing happen , , i annoyied with that kind of the conditions . Hope they can improve with the overall maintenance of the hotel .
Looks lovely in the photos , our room was quite nice , pool area great !

Just had 14 night ' s at Rosani Hotel this makes it the 6th time i have stayed there , and the staff are still the best make you feel so happy to be there , best way to start your holiday . the price is right for and you get what you pay for not 5 star .
I love the concept of this apartment , the first floor got living room , kitchen and bath room . Second floor is the bed room unique and nice . Cozy and clean . Worth the money .

Hotel was not good , find lot of mosquitoes in the hotel . food was not good there . staff members not cooperative . They charge 50 times more money for international call . I never ever go that hotel on any geographic location .

Forget about the dirty curtain and bed sheet with stain . Because it has a great view ! Nice restaurant . Team member are so helpful and friendly . We booked the room with Mt Batur sunrise tracking package . It was a great experience !

Wouldn ' t rate this hotel . . . No english speaking employees . . . Room smelt moldy on arrival . . . Bathroom looks dirty . . , Terrible wifi . . . Limited food for room service . . . Only good thing was close to shops and bars . . .

Been here for 3 times for holiday in bali , strategic place 20 mts to airport , near to krisna oleh " and many places , the room was okey tidy but the floor was so sticky , dear fame i think you should fix your breakfast menu and put real fresh milk . . .

Always staying here during my business trip to kuta area . Staff already knowing me , quick response from them if you have some trouble with the room , they upgrade me to much bigger room when the ac was not cold . Breaksast was great .

Nice affordable quiet relaxing place with friendly helpful staff , great food and great central location with beach and shopping all a short walk away . Wifi can be slightly unreliable at times but overall we have been very happy with our stay .

Pros Good location , warm reception , clean rooms , 10 minutes walking to Kuta beach , 5 - 7 minutes walking to Lulu mall , lot of food / spa options just outside the hotel , close to airport and taxi stand , several departmental stores just outside the hotel for daily needs like water , beer , chocolates etc .

The Alea hotel is a great place for the family . We had a good time there . Most of the staffs are friendly and helpful . Putu ( receptionist ) she was very helpful and friendly . Everything was great except , they do not many amenities , they don ' t provide extra waters and room just okay .

This is my second stay . During the pandemic the breakfast served a la carte . Mains , Water , Tea / Coffee and sliced fruits . The room itself was ok , bed was comfy . Location was good , can easily find food .

I give it five stars for pricing , location , ambiance and service . It is located in the heart of Legian / Seminyak . Just keep walking and shopping at every turn until your stomach rumbles and there are cafes and restaurants littered all around . For a budget type stay , it is unbeatable . Will return here when I visit Bali again .

The staff were great they couldnt do enough to help us the rooms were comfortable and clean . There was a horrible smell coming up through the drains that wasnt very pleasant . Linda and her staff were wonderful maybe they can westernise their breakfast a bit not everyone likes rice and noodles for brekky everyday .

stay in this place after having a hard party night at the Club in Seminyak . the location make the hotel feel so comfy and quiet , perfect for hangover cure . the price is reasonably cheap and the quality is also good .

Seems like new hotel , because everything in rooms look new . Location is perfect , close to the airport and close to the beach also shopping centre . Book for family and we have connecting rooms . Breakfast is very good and staff is very friendly . Thank you Solaris Kuta for excellent service .

Terrific view drom the room , but the room smells moldy and the bathroom was full of mold . The table in the restaurant was full of dead flies and bugs when we came for breakfast and in general everything was dirty .

Aston Inn Tuban is a very quiet hotel near the Kuta beach , it is small but very friendly hotel . The employee at the front desk are very kind . The breakfast is not good , limit types serves . I like the pool very much . The walk to the beach need 30 minutes walking , and around 15 , 000 by taxi .

Very nice staycation for us . . Staff soo friendly , room was clean and tase of food was good . . . location hotel near center of kuta area and easy to find place for chill . . For sure will be back again . .

Nice and clean . Pool was lovely , great staff . Breakfast ok , not a lot to choose . Close to shops , restaurants . we stayed for two nights before going to Seminyak . Enjoyed our time there . Would go again . Highly recommended .

The best customer service one could ask for , with good value for money . The hotel location was optimal to visit most of the buzzing tourist destination in Bali . The hotel staff were very approachable and friendly , with quick response to queries . Would highly recommend this hotel .

Had a flight cancelled so airline put me up at hotel . Staff was very friendly and accommodating . Walking distance to all the attractions of kuta but far enough away for some quiet and no madness . Rooms are clean and modern . Hot water shower is very nice and hotel has a good pool for relaxing .

Got upgraded during checkin , the room just next to swimming pool . Great room decor and good service by staff . Do make use of the free airport pick up as well as shuttle to Kuta . Breakfast selection too simple . But well its not a five star hotel so its understanable . Tried the spa , cost wise is standard , service is good .

Love the architecture but not the entire room inside . It's like entering hotel trapped in the past glory . Bed , bedsheet , pillows , everything seemed like coming from my childhood memories . Morning sneezing as allergic reaction confirmed further about the room . You also got small buzzing accompanies at night while sleeping .

property very close with airport , entertainment ( Lippo Mall ) & Beach , enough with walking . So you can find anything you want around here . They have rooftop pool is + . BUT Breakfast was so . . so and the staff unfriendly especially in the breakfast time . They always Clustered inside the bar counter .
Staff friendly although struggle to comprehend sometimes which is understandable would recommend lovely pool and relatively close to kuta square .

Good value for not big money , good location in the city centre , clean room and showe . Breakfast could be more variable . Staff on reception could have more knowledge . Staff switch off lights at the swimming pool at 9 pm , it could be longer .

Excellent location , within walking distance to many markets , cafe , restaurants , Kuta beach , Discovery mall , great value for money . The room wasn ' t really clean , there are parts of that weren ' t clean .

Great room , but still needs to be maintained so far , not bad choice of breakfasts , good location , good price for backpackers . It needs to make the hallways being touched by more light , repainted wall , and not too gloomy . The airconditioner is still well - functioned , but also needs more maintenance since the sound is noisy .

Bed . . . so big & fluffy Food . . . delicious Staff . . . super friendry & kind Price . . . reasonable but . . . Pool . . . dirty Air conditioning . . . didn ' t work Bugs . . . so many Thank you for your services . We hope to go to again Bali and meet you !

It ' s an older hotel but you can only tell by the rooms . Location is fantastic , walk out and everything is happening . Kimberley spa on the street to the left is cheap and have fantastic staff who do great massages . staff are friendly and includes breakfast for the price is awesome . Loved our stay with the bali summer hotel .

Nice hotel , easy to find , good breakfast , hotel is clean , nice rooms and staff are friendly and helpful . A little away from kuta centre , it wasn ' t near the beach but free shuttle bus into town from 10 AM - 06 PM .

We stayed for 2 weeks , part of our stay we had a conference at the hotel which was run very well , food was great . I looked forward to see what different food there was for breakfast and I wasn ' t disappointed once .

I stayed at this hotel for 1 ( one ) night to catch my flight in the morning . Room was okay , price was okay . The best thing of this hotel is that they have airport shuttle for free . Recommended if you want to stay near airport , but if you don ' t have to deal with airport please go somewhere else .

Located next to the airport , no need to worry about traffic to the airport . The room is quite nice and clean for a nice price . Good for transit hotel with a nice price . The staff is nice , the breakfast was standard .

I recently stayed at this hotel in transit to Lombok . Close to the airport really friendly staff , free shuttle to and from airport and to go shopping . Breakfast mostly Asian but can get omelette a to order . Overall very happy & good price . Room was very clean & very quiet .

Right next to the airport . This hotel is clean and quiet and well suited for a stopover . The layout of the hotel is a little strange ( lots of ups and downs with bags ) . Well suited for its purpose . There is also a shuttle bus . Not much in the surrounding area .

Its only a short stay for me and my wife but everything went very good . The arrangement for pick up and drop off airport was very good and in time , the staff are very friendly and helpful , quick check in , very cozy room . . its just great . . . Definitely we will come back and stay in this hotel . . .

We used the Harris as a base for a visit around East Java . The hotel was very covenient . The location , very close to the airport , is very good , On our return from East Java we returned to the Harris for a stopover for six hours before catching our international flight on to Sydney .

i stayed with my husband and our kids in a suite room , the room is large and so comfort . My kids were enjoy . The staff were helpful . Breakfast is so delicious , unfortunately they forgot to give us welcome drink .

Got room in front of the pool . . Nice price , nice room . . Breakfast was good . . Location is good , near the airport . . But there is no elevator , i need to use stair . . It is good for short trip or for sleeping only . .

I arrived late at night and just needed somewhere to sleep before travelling to Ubud the next day . The Harris Hotel is very close to the airport . The room was a little Spartan , but the common areas were delightful , and it was wonderful to have so much light in the corridors , thanks to the novel design . The staff were friendly and helpful , and the breakfast was nice .

Good for short brake before take off , hotel transfer or one day stay as next to airport with free transfer . Small rooms but clean . Located far from beach , and builders are all around . Do not take it as relaxing holliday .

We haft to book a room for 1 night due to flight mick up , we booked in after midnight and the staff couldn ' t be more helpful and friendly , the room is sufficient , clean and has good its close to Kuta but far enough to be a bit less hectic .

Although this hotel is small in size , this hotel is quite comfortable and offers a good value of money . It ' s clean , good size of room and friendly staff . Wi - fi connection is good and free of charge .

Within a reasonable walking distance from the airport ( except you have to go around a rather long fence to get there ) . Modern hotel , no nonsense good service . Definitely value for money . Ideal for a late night arrival or early morning departure .
although the location of the hotel is very close to the Ngurah Rai airport , but the atmosphere is quiet enough to relax and also very easy to become a meeting place with family and partners .

This hotel we Stayed in this hotel for just day rest as our flight was late at night . The rooms are adequate , clean . . a little musty but overall it was at a bargain price of $ 60 . The hotel has free transfers to the airport , it ' s literally next door . The staff are super bubbly and friendly .

It ' s very near the airport like less than 5min . Even tho i stay only for 1 night and arriving late , i still get picked up . Room & bathroom is clean . Price is budget and it has free wifi ! Many hotels do not give free wifi , so this is great !

Friendly staff with lovely clean rooms , although they were quite dark inside . Nice clean pool to lounge around , breakfast was average but it ' s easy to go elsewhere . Very close to airport , and they can arrange transport for free - so perfect for an overnight stay .

A very good option for those that need to stay close to Denpassar airport . Efficient shuttle service , very friendly staff and decent rooms with free wi fi . An honest hotel . Breakfast is a bit limited in " western " options ( spaghetti carbonara , anyone ? ) .

have to catch a morning flight back to our home , this a smart option . just a step away from the airport with pick up and drop service . situated within nice area , it ' s not crowded at all . we always ask to have a room in the opposite of swimming pool and we ' re enjoy walking to kuta in the evening . room is smallish and compact .

staff is incredibly nice and friendly . . . . . breakfast good , Airport pick up and Drop and free WiFi are Pluses for reconsidering to stay again . However , if rates keep going up . ( service still same ) . . then competition might get tough with more other options . . . . . better keep rates reasonable . . . . . . .

We had a layover in Bali so we didn ' t want to be far from the airport . So glad to stay at Harris Kuta Tuban , the staff are really friendly and were so helpful too allow us to have a early check - in so that we could relax before taking our next flight .

The room is nice and clean , and very closes to the airport , not far to the others places the staffs were polite , the food is ok and had a free shutle bus which i didnt know until the staff told me about it , i appreciated thanks .

I love to stay at Harris Tuban . It's close to the airport , only bus ( I'm sorry to say ) probably need to have a good air conditioner . The driver is good and friendly . I love to stay at Harris Tuban . And tell to all friends to stay there .

Since I started to stay at this hotel , I get to know some of the staff , makes it easier to communicate when I need something , like extra bottles of water , extra toilet paper and pick up / transfer from and to the airport . In general , it is a perfect location for transit . .

I stay there to take a time before a long way flying back to my country , it is near the airport , they have pick up service anddrop off , that ' s why O decided to stay there . The food is amazing , they are very happy people and nice . So many facilities . I relaxed a lot .

Had to stay here due to a delayed flight , would not recommend . The complementary buffet food had been sitting out for hours , when we went to order food instead of taking the risk it was going to be an hour wait for spaghetti . . others in our group ordered food and when they received it it was all cold ( pizza , burger , and spaghetti ) .

A regular stop for us in Bali , located right next to the airport and close enough to main shopping strips with plenty of eating and restaurant choices , with a large mall only 10min walk away . Exceptionally friendly service by all staff , great pool area and relaxing comfortable rooms .

We stayed here for our really short 7 hour layover in Bali . We didnt fancy staying in the airport for that long and thankfully we found this place ! they picked us up from the arrivals and shuttled us to the hotel in a matter of minutes . We used the spa massage and had in room dining and was fantastic for that really short stop over . Staff were all fantastic !

The service was very good . But the hotel should work on its poor internet connection . We couldn't find internet at night and the connection was not secure . Apart from that the staff were friendly and the view was good .

This was the first time I stayed at the hotel for transit en - route to Sydney . I can only recommend highly of the professionalism of the staff , cleanliness and facilities in the room , airport transfer with very polite drivers . Will always choose to stay here !

Excellent hotel , staff and facilities . Never have any trouble with my bookings etc . Intend to use in future visits to Bali . There was no trouble checking in or out . Room was clean and facilities were excellent .

Conveniently located near the airport for those late flight arrivals . Only downside was the very loud 5 . 15am wakeup call from the call to prayer down the road . Out of the hotel ' s control , but still . . .

The location close to airport and hotel prepare ti pick up and drop to airport . Front desk staff is very welcome and humble welcoming me . For me the negative thing is bath towel not so good , and also the breakfast restaurant not so responsive .

Excellent location and service , except the price . Booked thru Agoda and during the booking it ' s hard to notice that they have this Transit offer which means you can only use the room for 7hrs and you have to pay 135 , 000 IDR equivalent to 10 USD to avail the room for overnight .

It is a hotel that is very near Ngurah Rai Airport , only take 5 minutes by car . The airport shuttle is very good as it saves money from the expensive taxi at the airport counter . The hotel ' s staff were very friendly and responsive and the hotel room was spacious . Overall , it was an pleasant experience to stay at Harris Tuban .

We booked a 7 hour transit room here before our late evening flight out and it was lovely . Clean rooms , friendly staff , free transfer to airport which runs every 30mins . Our room was 506 , 000rp which we thought was very reasonable .

We flew in late so stayed here one night before commencing our trip . For $ 50 , 000rp it had a pick up from the airport , WiFi , 2 bottles of water , toothbrush etc . it's a big hotel with clean rooms and everything you need . I would stay here again as a stop over .

My flight is 7 in the morning so i choose this hotel . . The hotel is very near to the airport and they have free shuttle every 30 minute . . very close to mall ( sorry i forgot the name ) by walk around 9 minute . The room not big but comfortable . .

We had one night at Harris in between flights . The staff were all very friendly , the room was clean and the free shuttle bus service to and from the airport was excellent . The room service had limited menu ( at 3am ) but what we could order was fresh and good quality .

Nice place to stay close to airport . AC was very noisy couldn ' t sleep well . . . Pool is nice and rooms are spacious . All in all not too bad . Breakfast wasn ' t included . Staff super friendly . And close to airport .

Have stayed at Harris Hotel several times prior to a flight - airport transfers are efficient and free , the rooms are bright and comfortable , with good wi - fi and a good selection of TV - channels . There is a pool and a spa .

The location is excellent . Near airport and kuta . The hotel provides transportation to airport and Lippo mal Kuta . So , it is a perfect choice for you who find good location and good value of money .

If need a place for a night or 2 transitting through Bali ( as i do more than a dozen times a year ) harris tuban is place for you . Quick walk to and from airport . Clean rooms , good ac , hot shower , clean sheets and decent breakfast .

We book for two rooms . The hotel was nice . They have great service and hospitality from all the staff especially their manager Ms . Rajani . The rooms was super clean , fresh , and comfy . The pool was nice and clean , breakfast was delicious but need bit more variative . We were really happy staying in this hotel .

We needed to be close to the airport due to an early flight . It was the right choice and a free shuttle was an added bonus . Rooms were clean and comfortable . Service was good too . Good location for food in area local and western .

Booked a transit room for between flights . Room was clean , bed very comfortable and all the amenities we needed were onsite . We ate at the cafe service was excellent as was food . Only problem was the noise , we were trying to have an afternoon sleep before an early morning flight and there was lots of noise from in the hotel and outside .

I booked this hotel as a transit room . But it is so quiet and in such a great location i would stay there again . The rooms are very clean and contain everything you would need . There is a nice pool . The hotel offers free transport to the airport and also to Kuta square and other locations .

Tired rooms - hotel rooms clearly havent had renovation for long time . The room also didnt feel clean enoughNo noise isolation - could hear the road outside , and once prayer time started at around 4 .

Great value for money , very near the airport , nice and clean room , quiet hallway , had a good night rest . Food was a little too salty , had the nasi goreng kampung and soto ayam and strawberry juice , reasonable prices for the food and drink .

Very close to the airport but we didn ' t hear any airplane , receiving a baby coat which is surprisingly good for my baby and her brother to sleep in , cozy bed , I will definitely go back to this hotel again .

I stayed for two nights and had two rooms with connecting doors . The service was excellent and the staff very friendly and well spoken in English . I arrived at midnight from the airport which is five minutes away . The staff were very efficient and fast at checking and a porter showed me my room which overlooks a superb swimming pool which has a call phone service for requesting food and drinks .

I used the hotel for a transit stop in Bali . Very good service . I was picked up from the airport and delivered back to the airport as requested . Hotel is a few minutes drive from the airport and food and drink are available in the hotel and at shops near the hotel .

Great hotel location , friendly staff , delicious food , clean comfortable room . Very good massage at the Spa , nice pool . Of the minuses note bad Internet and noise from the construction site nearby . For us , these disadvantages were insignificant .

So that night I was ordering oxtail soup . I ate some but it's really shocking because I found a maggots . In my soup . Disgusting . Makes me sick and vomit . I have a picture of it . I will not recommend to eat at Harris restaurant .

We arrived late at night do we needed a clean place to stay , the hotel offered us free pick up from the hotel . The staff is amazing we checked - in in no time , our room was nice and clean . The breakfast was delicious not much variety but was enough for is .

I stayed at the Harris for 1 evening on my way back to Australia . Service was friendly , room very clean and the bed comfortable . Just what I needed before flying home . Breakfast was plenty of fruit , pancakes and of course good coffee .

Perfect cheap hotel close to airport . We booked day use for 6 hours before fly out . Good cheap hotel for eha4 we wanted . Bathroom was clean however shower had mould . Good value for basic facilities . .

Budget accommodation with excellent breakfast and friendly , helpful staff . Free airport shuttles 24 hours . WiFi speed was poor . ATM nearby and nice sate across the road . The pool looked nice although we didn ' t get a chance to use it .

We used the Harris Hotel to store our bags & to have shower facilities before our late night flight . The hotel was clean with a very decent pool & is located within walking distance to 2 shopping malls , Kuta beach & the airport . So it was convenient in every way . The free airport transfer inclusion was a bonus too .

So we stayed one night in this hotel and it was alright . Nothing more nothing less . They had a pool which looked ok , and a gym . The gym needs to improve immensely though since all the equipment is rusty or broken . The room was alright but with dirty sheets ( looked like a dirty footprint ) so we asked them to change it which they did straight away .

So . . . you are in transit waiting for your next flight and have been kicked out of your hotel at mid - day . This is the answer . 10 minutes by their free shuttle to the airport . Clean , nice pool , good food ( tho of course unexciting ) and helpful staff . A lot better than hanging around for 9 hours at the airport in Denpasar .

Booked a room for 6 hours as we had a late flight . Rooms were clean , comfy bed , amenities , bottled water and good room service . They also offer a free shuttle service to the airport which is 5 minutes away .

We stayed at the Harris hotel at the start and end of our Bali vacation . It is a 5 minute walk to the airport or a 7 minute drive . The the bed was comfortable . The room was cool w / a lot of natural light . The breakfast buffet was full and plentiful and the staff very helpful . Simple lodging for an airport hotel .

I had to book a hotel quickly and stumbled upon this hotel . I didn ' t expect much but this was a really nice hotel . The staff was great , providing the documents I needed to be printed . Also , their room service was great : the food was delicious and I found myself ordering more . Overall , I recommend this place .

Booked in for day use before late flight . Hotel is old and needs attention . Reception would not change a 50k note for transport . Room was booked for 1pm check in , waited for an hour as room not ready . As a Harris hotel fan and member I was very very disappointed with the standard of property and service . Would not recommend .

Stayed here in a transit room ( 7 hour block ) after checking out of another hotel in Legian to wait for our late evening flight . Everything you need , free shuttle , cheap food , clean room , AC , pool . Friendly helpful staff . Can't ask for much more for around $ 40 Australian .

I like the view of the hotel , the environment , the people , the service , the location is very comfortable and the meals . One of the important element that I have to recognize that your hotel is very safe and I have never worry to leave my stuff inside the hotel when I want to go out .

Clean room with free toiletries . Took the bali massage and it was heavenly . Didn't realize there was a gym too until I saw it by accident . A bit noisy room since 6 am families started to play loudly in the inner yard which woke me up and I was tired for the rest of the day .

Its proximity to airport was our primary condition in choosing Harris Hotel as a transit hotel prior to our trip back home . Staff was pleasant , reliable and helpful . My only complaint is room cleanliness . But we only stayed for less than 7 hours so we didn ' t mind it very much .

Over all is good , but please maintenance your internet because so slowly and bad signal . . I cant connect to WIFI . Its too make me dizzy , because my job need a fast internet . Hopely getting better for the next .

We arrived late and stayed at Harris before departing the following day . Staff are amazing , the 24 hour food service was convenient and surprisingly tasty food . Had connecting rooms and recommend the stay for anyone needing to be close to airport . Outside along road are conveniant stores and warungs .

Lovely hotel . Rooms are small . The location right next to the airport allow you to walk to the airport itself ! Hence , if you wanna save up the taxi fare and want to avoid the jam , then this is a perfect spot !

Overall is good . Food is good . Breakfast is good and worthy . Service is good . Airport pickup is very excellent . Shower is good . The downsides are the rooms have cigarettes smell and internet too slow .

Located right near the airport with free airport shuttle . Pick up was good . As regards the rooms they desperately need a new coat of paint as it's looking old . The mattress was comfortable and breakfast was good .

labels.opinion: need a new coat of paint
